K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-2: 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-3: chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-4: drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-5: skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-6: ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-7: de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-8: rgyal po de la bu dag yod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-9: sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-11: yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-12: ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-13: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-14: 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-15: mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-16: rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-17: lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-18: na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-19: 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-20: bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-21: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-22: 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-23: ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-24: srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-25: bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-26: bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:90b-27: yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-0: @91a *// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-1: de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-2: dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-3: 'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-4: de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-5: nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-6: rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-7: gzhal med khang gis brgyan can khyim 'dir spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-8: 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-9: lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-10: rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-11: bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-12: mig ni padma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-13: bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid du 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-14: so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-15: dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-16: brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-17: phrag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-18: lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-19: sor mo byin pa phra bar legs dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-20: lce ni zangs mdog 'dra ba srab cing ngag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-21: tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-22: so ni thags bzang so rnams rad rod med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-23: mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91a-24: lto ba phyang nger 'dug cing lte ba sdug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-0: @91b sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-1: byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-2: mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-3: dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-4: gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-5: rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-6: gzhon nu snying rje ltos la rtse bar byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-7: bu gcig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-8: mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-9: shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin lhung gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-10: nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsten par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-11: blo gros snying po ldan des sme ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-12: pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-13: yab cig khyod ni med par gsungs pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-14: gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-15: yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-16: bsam ste gtan la phab la rgyal po gson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-17: ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-18: sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-19: sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-20: mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-21: mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-22: mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-23: long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-24: long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-25: thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-26: mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:91b-27: grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-1: btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-2: sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-3: nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-4: sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-5: 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-6: long ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-7: nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-8: mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-9: bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-10: khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-11: bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam par smod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-12: 'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-13: sprul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-14: rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-15: me yi phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-16: blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-17: smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-18: rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-19: rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-20: sprul gyi pags snying brjes pa ci 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-21: ngar snabs rus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-22: blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-23: sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-24: gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-25: blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92a-26: ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-0: blo @92b gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-1: gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-2: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-3: grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga; ;ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-4: 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-5: mi yi sengge de ni 'dod khams 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-6: tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir; ;tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-7: de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-8: pha de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-9: zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-10: legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-11: 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-12: de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam mam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-13: nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-14: 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-15: 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-16: bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-17: sa bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-18: rgyal bo bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-19: 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-20: rjes su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam mam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-21: khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-22: bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-23: de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-24: rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:92b-25: sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-0: skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs @93a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-5: ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-6: de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na sh'akya stong tsam zhig dang dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-7: rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-8: ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-9: zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-10: gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-11: dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-12: gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-14: chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-15: de'i rin po che sna bdun ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-17: 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-18: glang po rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-20: nor bu rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-21: bud med rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-22: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93a-23: blon po rin po che ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-0: yan lag @93b mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-1: gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-2: des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-3: mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang mthun pas legs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-4: de ltar gyur na; bdag cag kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-7: bsti stang du byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-9: dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-11: gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-12: des de snyam du bsam nas sh'akya rnams la bsgo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-13: nga'i bu de la blta ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-14: bsnyen bkur byed par su'ang ma 'gro zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-15: la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-16: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:93b-17: de'i tshe sh'akya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-0: sh'akya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste tshe dang @94a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-1: ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-5: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-9: de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-13: bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-14: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sh'akya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-18: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-22: de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-25: bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94a-26: sh'akya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang sh'akya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur @94b spyon; tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-1: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-3: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-7: de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-10: shin tu ma mnyel tam; bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-11: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sh'akya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-15: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-19: de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-22: bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-23: sh'akya'i bu mya ngan med dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-24: mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-25: sh'akya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-26: sh'akya'i bu shin tu legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-27: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:94b-28: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas @95a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-1: byon to; ;tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-2: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-6: de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-7: bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-9: bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sh'akya'i bu mya ngan med dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-12: mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-13: mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-14: bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-18: de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-21: bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-23: 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-24: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-25: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-26: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-27: sh'akya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-30: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95a-32: bdag cag gis de ltar ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-0: 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang @95b mas nga'i bu la blta ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-1: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-2: la la zhig de la blta ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-3: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-4: lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-6: de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-7: bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-9: kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-10: shin tu nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-11: ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-12: 'on kyang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-13: snyam nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:95b-14: sems mnyam par bzhag pa des nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-0: rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing rta la bdun srid du 'phags te rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te @96a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-1: tshigs su bcad nas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-2: tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-3: khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-4: khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-5: brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-6: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-8: rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-9: bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-10: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-11: bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-12: yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-13: khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-14: gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-15: ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-16: ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-17: phyogs rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-18: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-19: ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun du snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-20: ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-21: srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-22: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-23: mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96a-24: ji ltar nyi mas zil non skar ma rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-0: nyin par 'od stong lam @96b mer mi rung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-1: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-2: zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-3: ji ltar nyi ma'i zil gnon zla ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stong nyid mi snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-5: de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-6: nyi mas zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-7: sengge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-8: shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-9: ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-10: stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-11: de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-12: bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-13: shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-14: gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-15: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-16: spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-17: snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-18: ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-19: bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-20: lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-21: lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-22: 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la bton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-23: ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-24: sgang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:96b-25: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-1: ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-2: ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-3: rtsva dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-4: 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-5: me tog sna tshogs kyis ni sa mdzes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-6: de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-7: ma 'dres bco brgyad chos lnga'i sdong po la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-9: 'bras bu spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-10: ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-11: lha yi gnas gyur mi bsgul rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-12: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-13: dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-14: bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-15: lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-16: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-17: dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-18: byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-19: thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng rir ldan pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-20: dran pa nyer gzhag char rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-21: rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-22: yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-23: ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97a-24: ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skem //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-0: rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par @97b mdzes; ;ting 'dzin tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-1: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i nor bu rin chen tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-2: byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs; ;thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-3: tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-4: ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-5: byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-6: bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-7: tshul khrims nags mtha' bsten pa'i stobs chen po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-8: ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-9: stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-10: rgyal ba stobs can sengge khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-11: thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-12: rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-13: byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-14: khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-15: tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-16: bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-17: ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-18: rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-19: dge ba yongs su bzung bas sdig bcom ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-20: nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge bsnyen bka' stsol pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-21: lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:97b-22: rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-0: @98a *// tshul khrims mchog sprin blo ros glog 'byin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-1: yan lag brgyad lam cher chen rlan gyis spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-2: thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-3: khyod kyi sras ni klu chen po 'brug sgra sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-5: gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-6: bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-7: de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-8: thang gnas autpa la bzhin ma rnying ngam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-10: rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-11: dgyes shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-12: thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-13: gser gyi padma lta bur rgyal ma rnying //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-15: sngon chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-16: gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-17: bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-18: da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-20: bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-21: ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-22: mnal lam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-23: sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-25: che ba'i rkyen 'os lam mchog bshams pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98a-26: me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-0: bud @98b med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-1: da lta mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-3: thub chen 'phags pa gzims lam gzims pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-4: byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-5: dga' bas gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-6: srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-8: sh'akya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-9: bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-10: gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-11: nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'; ;'char kas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-12: chos kyi byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-13: zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-14: zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba bstan mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-15: ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-17: sngon chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-18: yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-19: rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-20: nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-22: khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-23: thub pa de bkru gzhan yang dkru ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-24: sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:98b-25: rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-0: gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas @99a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-2: rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang po gyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-3: tsandan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-4: nags chen de gseb thub pa su yis brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-6: tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-7: khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-8: mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:99a-9: rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104a-4: 'jig rten gtso la dad pa thob gyur na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104a-10: bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104a-11: 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104a-12: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang thos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104a-13: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon du mthong //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104a-16: de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:104b-17: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:105a-5: mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu mdzad pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:105a-8: brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:105b-0: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs logs su brten te steng gi bar snang la dri za'i @105b tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106a-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106a-8: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106a-12: gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106b-15: rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106b-16: mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106b-19: lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106b-20: nyi ma de ni padma'i kha yang 'byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:106b-21: nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-1: gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-2: mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-3: nyan thos padma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-4: lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-5: 'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-6: lha yi 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-7: bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes; ;rkang gnyis dbang po dpal stug stobs bcu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-8: dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-9: rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-10: dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-11: lha yi rgyal po mtha' bral dbang byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-12: mtha' bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-13: mtha' bral bzang po lha tshogs nang zhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-14: mtha' bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-15: gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-16: lam ngan ngan 'gror 'gro ba zil mnan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-17: yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-18: stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-19: lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-20: dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-21: lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-22: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107a-23: de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-0: lha dang lha min tshogs kyis @107b bla mar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-1: 'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-2: skyes bu sengge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-3: lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-4: lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-5: rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-6: gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-7: de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-8: stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-9: ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-10: skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-11: lha yi rgyal po dbang bsgyur byed pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-12: lha gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-13: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-14: rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-15: de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-16: sngon chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-17: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-18: rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-19: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-20: tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-21: shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-22: yongs su rjod par byed cing mngon du mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-23: de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa; ;dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-24: mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:107b-25: 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon du mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-1: pa lha dang mi rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-2: lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-3: skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-4: gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-5: bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-6: rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-7: ri rab srang la gcal du rung yang srid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-8: sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-9: rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas sh'akya rnams la bsgo ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-15: nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-20: de bzhin na dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-21: dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-22: nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-25: gzhon pa'i mchog rnams stod de sta gon gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108a-27: de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de blta zhing 'dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-0: @108b zhes gsol nas sh'akya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-1: theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstad [*bstod?] do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-2: de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma ser skya'i gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-3: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-4: bye ma gtsang ma bdal du bcug ste nyams dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-5: me tog sil mas gang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-7: phreng ba mang pos brgyan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-8: skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-15: yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-16: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chas pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-17: bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-18: de'i tshe sh'akya la la'i gzhon pa'i mchog ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-20: 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang sngo la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-21: rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-22: rgyan rnams kyang sngo la dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-23: 'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-27: nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:108b-28: lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-1: tshar ma bcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-2: rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta ba rnams zhal ta byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-3: rgyan sngon po can gyi lcags thogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-4: khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-5: rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-6: shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-7: sh'akya la la'i bzhon pa rnam pa 'di lta bu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-8: 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas thams cad du dmar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-9: thams cad du dkar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-10: thams cad du khra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-11: shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-12: shing rta de dag re res phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-14: gser gyi dra bas g-yogs pa sha stag bshams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-15: glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-17: blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-18: glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-19: gser gyi dril bu g-yer kha brgyus pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109a-20: rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis @109b rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-1: sh'akya rnams rgyang ring po 'ong ba gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-3: khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis sh'akya ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-6: sh'akya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-7: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-8: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-9: ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa nas;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-10: rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-11: 'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'ongs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-12: de ltar bstan gyi khyed rnams de nyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-13: shing rta brgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-14: legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-15: ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-16: mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-17: shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-18: rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-19: mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-20: de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-21: lcags kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams kyang sngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-22: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-23: mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:109b-24: rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-2: rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-3: mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-4: de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-5: lcags kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-6: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-7: mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-8: rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-9: shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-10: rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-11: mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-12: de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-13: lcags kyang dmar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dmar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-14: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-15: mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-16: rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-17: shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-18: rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-19: mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-20: de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-21: lcags kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dkar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-22: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas; ;mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-23: rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110a-24: shing rta khra zhing rgyan kyang khra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-0: rta yang khra zhing khra ba'i @110b 'khor dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-1: mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang khra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-2: de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang khra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-3: lcags kyang khra zhing thag srang rnams kyang khra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-4: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-5: mi rnams kyang ni khra ba'i gos can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-6: rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-7: shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-8: glang po brgyad khri tshang bar bshams pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-9: gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-10: glang chen rnams ni gser gyis tshal bar brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-11: de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-12: khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-13: rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-14: shing rta rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-15: de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-16: rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-17: rgyal po'i chas gos rgyal po 'cham stabs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-18: glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-19: rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-20: me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-21: dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-22: bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-23: glu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang gyad rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-24: bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:110b-25: rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-0: rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin @111a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-2: rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-4: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-5: sh'akya rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-6: rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas mdun du bdar te n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-7: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-8: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g-yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhal 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-9: g-yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhal 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-10: de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zhal 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-13: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g-yob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111a-14: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-0: yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom @111b ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-1: rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-2: mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-3: de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-8: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-9: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-14: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-15: lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-16: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:111b-17: glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang la sgra 'byin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-0: mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang @112a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-1: bar snang las byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-2: sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-3: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-4: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-5: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-6: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-7: lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-8: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-10: sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe 'di skad du nga la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-11: gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-0: lha dang mi'i @112b 'khor can du gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-2: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-3: bcom ldan 'das bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-14: zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-15: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas dzambu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma yol yang dzambu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de ma btang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-16: lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-17: da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-18: zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-19: gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-20: sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:112b-21: nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-2: gang tshe thub chen zhing ba'i grong bzhud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-3: dzambu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-4: lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-5: de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-6: da [*nga?] yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-7: thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-8: thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-9: khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-10: mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-11: pha dang ma yis bsam ste btags pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-12: khyod kyis bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-13: don grub lags par bdag gis nga gdod 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-14: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sengge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ngas bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-15: thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu yog par bting ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-16: steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bres so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chag sa de nas babs te gdan khri bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113a-18: rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-0: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha @113b rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-4: ser skya zhes bya grong khyer dam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-5: n+ya gro dha yi ra ba nyams dga' bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-6: rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-7: 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-8: skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-9: lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-10: klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-11: dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-12: de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-13: mi'am ci yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-14: de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-15: rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-16: de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-17: tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-18: 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-19: 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-20: dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-21: spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-22: gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-23: log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-24: sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-25: rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-26: yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:113b-27: de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-2: tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-3: da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-4: rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-5: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-6: gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-7: rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-8: khab nas ma byung zhig ces mngon gsol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-9: gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-10: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-11: rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-12: 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-13: chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-14: gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-15: mi yi bdag dang mi yi mchod par 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-16: lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-17: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-18: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-19: bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-20: rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-21: 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-22: bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-23: de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-24: bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114a-25: rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-0: rgya mtsho'i rlabs @114b kyis rus sbal gcig cig 'phangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-1: rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-2: rus sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-3: de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-4: rgya mtsho'i rus sbal ga nas 'dir 'ongs kye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-5: nga yi the tshom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-6: myur du nga la smros zhes de skad smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-7: khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal de nyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-8: rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen des smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-9: nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-10: khron pa 'dir ni de ring bor bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-11: rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-12: nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te; ;nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-13: rus sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-14: de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-15: rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam mam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-16: 'on te khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-17: dris lan nga la myur du smros zhes smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-18: rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen rgyal po des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-19: khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-20: khron pa'i rus sbal khyod ni byis pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-21: blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-22: nga ni lan tshva can gyi chu der btsas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-23: yun ring dus nas de na skye skye yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-24: rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par mi nus na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-25: dbus lta shes par ga la nus zhes smras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-26: de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-27: bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:114b-28: gling bzhi ba yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-1: la slu ba mdzad par bzhed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-2: bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-3: chad pas mi gcad mtshon chas bda' med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-4: stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-5: 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-6: rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-8: de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-9: sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-10: rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-11: thugs kyis yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-12: 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-13: de yi tshe na de ni 'dus par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-14: rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-16: /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-17: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-18: lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115a-19: de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-0: rin thang med pa ji @115b snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-1: rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod pa phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-3: shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-4: rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba can la rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-5: rin po che sna bdun gyis byas pa'i 'phyar 'dab can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-6: gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-7: rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-8: shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-9: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-10: shing rta de dag 'dong na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-12: shing rta de dag sdod na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:115b-14: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par dbyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-0: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re @116a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-1: de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-4: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-5: sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-8: rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas sgra phyung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-9: sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-10: mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-12: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-13: sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-14: shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-15: shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-16: shing rta de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-17: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-19: la la ni; sil snyan dkrol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116a-25: tsandan dang autpa la'i phye mas 'thong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-0: ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas @116b 'thor; la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-1: lha ma yin gyi rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-6: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-8: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-10: pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-16: skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-20: shel gyi me tog dang; bee d'urya'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-22: mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-23: rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-25: rin po che sna bdun dang; dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-36: dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-40: mu tig gi do shal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:116b-44: mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-3: gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-5: rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-11: mu tig gi phreng ba thogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-19: mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-20: rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-21: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-22: rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-23: tshon sna tshogs can mang po thogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-25: spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-27: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to; ;mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-28: mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-29: rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-30: khyod la do zla yong ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-32: ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-33: dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117a-35: yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-0: nyon @117b mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-1: spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-2: sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-3: gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-4: le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-5: brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-6: nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-7: rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-11: bzhugs sa de dag re re zhing ba gam bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-13: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-14: ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-16: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-17: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba; blta na sdug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:117b-18: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:121b-3: sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:121b-5: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:121b-17: ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:121b-19: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:121b-20: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
