K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122a-44: me tog gi bla re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122a-46: nor bu'i bla re dag thogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-0: mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon @122b par 'thor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-2: rin po ches snyim pa bkang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-4: gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-5: tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so; ;gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-6: gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-7: de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-8: rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-9: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-10: stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-11: me 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-12: chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-13: 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-14: kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-15: 'khor brgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-16: mthar phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-17: 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-18: sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-19: 'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-20: padma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:122b-21: blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-0: sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis @123a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-2: rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad bshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-3: khyod ni gang du 'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-4: mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-5: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-6: sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-7: bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-8: mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i; ;'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-9: 'di ni byed pa tshor ba sems can med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-10: gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-11: chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun la dben //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-12: rang bzhin med cing g-yo med zhi zhes bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-13: su zhig bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-14: chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-15: de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-16: ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123a-17: rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-0: ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen @123b gyur pa; ;dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-1: 'gro la rtsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-3: lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-4: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha rol rnam brgal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-5: brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyis rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-6: bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-7: spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-8: blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-9: phyin ci log lta thibs por rab zhen blo ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-10: 'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-11: mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-12: mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-13: smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs zhes rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-14: thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:123b-15: srid pa gsum po dag na mi chags spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-0: dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba @124a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-2: gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-3: byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-4: mi dbang khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-5: lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-6: mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-7: lhar bcas 'jig rten zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-8: ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-9: rgya mtshos ba rjes chu bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-10: gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-11: gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-12: gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-13: dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-14: gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-15: sems can zil ldan zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-16: zil mnan de dag lam me min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-17: nyi mas me khyer zil brlags bzhin; ;ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-18: 'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-19: zil mnan de dag lam me min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124a-20: nyi mas zla 'od zil brlags bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-0: lha ma yin gyi @124b dbang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-1: 'dren pa'i blo gros zhi ba po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-2: zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-3: 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-4: char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-6: blags sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-7: nags btang nags mes shing bsregs ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-8: de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba bsregs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-9: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-10: dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-11: nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-12: bdud rtsis lus byugs dug bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-13: mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-14: mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-15: chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:124b-16: nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g-yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog @125a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-1: rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-2: gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis brtul; ;g-yul las dpa' bas g-yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-3: shin tu tshar bcad rang gi dbang du mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-4: thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-5: khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-6: gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-7: khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-8: rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-9: mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-10: khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-11: thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-12: 'gro ba kun tu khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-13: shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-14: shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-15: chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125a-16: thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po g-yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po @125b yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-1: dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-2: chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-3: gang 'di chos zhes brjod pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-4: de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-5: chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-6: rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-7: gang 'di chos zhes brjod pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-8: de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-9: ming ni ming gis dben pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-10: mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-11: chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-12: ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-13: rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-14: bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-15: gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-16: su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-17: khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-18: chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-19: chos rnams la yang mi chags par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-20: rnam par spyad do thub pa che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:125b-21: lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-2: tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-3: des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-4: de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-5: khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-6: gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-7: sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-8: dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-9: tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-10: skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-11: khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-12: mi yi sengge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-13: shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-14: des na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-15: 'khor du sengge lta bur sgra bsgrags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-16: rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126a-17: lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-0: thub pa chen @126b po skye bo tshogs pa 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-1: dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-2: kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-3: de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-5: skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-6: thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-7: de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-9: 'khor gyi tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-10: 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-11: de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan; ;gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-12: gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni dgag par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-13: 'dren pa su dag ma bslab rtogs par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-14: de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-16: rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:126b-17: yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-1: dga' ba de dag bag mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-2: mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-3: chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-4: rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-5: rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-6: de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-7: ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-8: byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-9: gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-10: mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-11: rgyal ba khyod kyis bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-12: mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yong mi mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-13: chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-14: yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-15: de nas thag bzang ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-16: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127a-17: yid bde ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang @127b po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-1: lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de; gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-10: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir logs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-12: 'jig rten phan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-13: mi yi sengge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-14: drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-15: skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-16: lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-17: 'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:127b-18: lha mi rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-2: de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-3: 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-5: mi yi sengge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-6: de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-7: mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-9: yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-10: bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-11: 'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di; ;su yis dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-12: 'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-13: drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-14: the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-15: mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-16: the tshom myur te legs par gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-18: rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-19: 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-20: de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-21: bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-22: bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:128a-23: lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-3: de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-5: de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-6: bde ba yang ma yin pa de mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-8: rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-9: char nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can de dag la lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-0: yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brel ba bstan cing bshad pas sems can de @133b dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-2: yid kyi las thams cad shes pa mngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-3: yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-4: rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-5: sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-6: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-7: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des gdams pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-9: chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-10: de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pas yid kyis 'chag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-11: chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-16: spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:133b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang ba ma spangs pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-0: de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal @134a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-2: yang dag pa'i spang pa yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-3: de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-4: sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-6: 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-7: de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-9: 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-12: 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-13: sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-15: de'i phyir de la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-16: sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-17: 'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-18: gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-20: mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134a-22: don dam pa'i chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog de @134b bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-2: 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-4: de la ji snyam du sems /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-9: sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-11: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-12: sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-14: nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-15: de dag la phan par bsam pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-16: bde ba sgrub pa'am; sdug bsngal bsal ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-17: de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-18: sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-24: de la ji snyam du sems /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-26: sems dma' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:134b-27: de dag la phan par bsam pa'am /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-9: de la ji snyam du sems /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-10: dad pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-11: tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-12: thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-13: brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-14: dran pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-15: ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-16: shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-17: de dag la phan par bsam pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-20: de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-21: sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam; gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-0: dge @135b ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-12: sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-14: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /
