K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-18: de dag phan par bsam pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-21: de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-22: sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-24: de la ji snyam du sems /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam; de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-27: dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:135b-28: de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te @136a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-1: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-2: der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-4: 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa chos ston gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-5: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;'jam dpal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-8: de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136a-9: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-0: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur @136b te bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan snga 'dir gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-1: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-2: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-4: de la ji snyam du sems; de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-6: bcom ldan 'das nyid ni; de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-9: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-10: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-12: sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-13: la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-17: rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:136b-18: bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-1: nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-2: dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-3: sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-4: sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-5: dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-6: bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-7: sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-8: da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-9: byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-10: stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-11: sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas; ;ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-12: rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-13: da dung dang po thugs bskyed par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-14: de dang der ni yongs bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-15: da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-16: sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-17: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-18: gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-19: chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'; ;khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-20: brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-21: la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-22: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-23: 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-24: bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-25: dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137a-26: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-0: padma chus mi @137b mi chags pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-1: 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-3: des na skye rgu 'di dag rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-4: gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod; ;la lar bltams pa yongs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-5: la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-6: la la na ni 'khor lo bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-7: la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-8: sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-9: dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-10: bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-11: sems can sus kyang yod ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-12: 'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-14: sems can rnam par 'dul don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-16: rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-17: byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-18: sems can rnam par gdul don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-20: smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-21: zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-22: rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-23: sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-24: de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-25: dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-26: dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-27: sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:137b-28: sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-1: bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-2: lung bstan pa yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-3: blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-4: lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-12: rdo'i snying po dang bdun no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-13: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-14: blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-15: rin po che sna bzhi ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-21: gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-25: dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka pa dang gdang bu rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138a-29: beed'urya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-0: @138b shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-4: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba bkra ba; blta na sdug pa rin po bdun gyis kun nas bskor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-5: de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste; 'di ltar gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-10: rdo'i snying po dang bdun no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-11: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-12: blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-17: mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-19: rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-21: blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-22: de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-24: blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-25: rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-29: rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:138b-30: rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-3: tog dkar po can sha stag sngon por sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-4: ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra ba; blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-6: blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-7: bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-8: dngul skud kyi bla re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-11: mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-13: rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-14: rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-15: de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-16: gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-17: rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-18: ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-19: bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-20: de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-22: glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139a-23: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste yongs 'dus rtol du gzhog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-0: de @139b bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-4: bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-5: de nas 'dab bzang brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-6: rga dang 'chi las rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-7: rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-8: sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-9: khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-10: bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus ldan zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-11: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-12: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-13: sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-14: bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-15: mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-16: spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:139b-17: 'gro ba rnam spyod mya ngan zlo bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-0: bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan @140a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-2: shes rab ldan pas mchog tu 'gyur bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-3: da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-4: skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-5: 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-6: bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-7: ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-8: 'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-9: bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-10: rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-11: brag ca nam mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-12: ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-15: rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-16: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-17: 'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu rkyen gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-18: 'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-19: 'dab bzang rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-20: bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang bar bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-21: lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140a-22: rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-0: 'gro ba thams cad thal @140b mo rab sbyar cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-1: dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-2: mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-3: rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-4: mi mchog khyod la 'khor dag mchi ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-5: 'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-6: the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-7: 'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis zhes mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-9: yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-10: rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste; ;slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-11: the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-12: rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-13: dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-14: rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa; thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-16: rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-17: 'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-18: 'dab bzang 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-19: rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:140b-20: 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-0: de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid @141a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-2: the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-3: bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-4: stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-5: 'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-6: 'dab chags dbang pos nga la mchod legs byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-7: ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-8: sred med bu lus shin tu mkhregs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-9: sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-10: yongs su btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-11: rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-12: gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-13: phun tshogs zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-14: 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-15: de dag nga la dga' bas mchod byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-16: dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-17: lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par de dag 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-18: 'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin; ;bskal pa bye ba gangg'a'i bye snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-19: de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-20: rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-21: de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-22: de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-23: mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141a-24: rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-0: ri rab @141b rgyal mtshan bskal la rab byung 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-1: lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi bgrangs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-2: 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-3: 'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-4: lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-5: skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-6: 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-7: de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-8: shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-9: 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i ngal bsal phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-11: mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-12: 'dab bzang lus su gyur nas stobs po che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-13: 'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-14: drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-15: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-16: dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-17: de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-18: dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur; ;tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dabs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-19: tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-20: nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-21: rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-22: tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-23: nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:141b-24: nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-3: de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-4: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-5: lung bstan pa yang thos nas mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te de dag dga' mgu yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste; dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-6: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-7: de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs beed'urya'i dra ba lda ldir bkye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-8: mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-10: bee d'urya'i thur ma brgyad stong bkye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-11: rin po che'i chun po dbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-14: sngon po lta bur ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-17: bee d'urya'i srab kyis bsrabs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-18: nor bu skar mdog gi bla re kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-19: des 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa gcig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142a-20: de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-0: blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug @142b bres par mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-1: bla re de'i kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bres so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang dag mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-3: klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-4: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te nam mkha' las 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag len cing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed la; lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-6: ta ma la'i lo ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-8: me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-10: tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-11: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-12: spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-13: na bza' dang rgyan dag kyang 'bul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-14: lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:142b-15: de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-0: sems can gang dag gis rol mo'i @143a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-1: sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-2: nor bu'i skar mdog gi bla re dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-4: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-5: khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-7: rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-8: de lta bu'i yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-9: sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-10: sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-11: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-12: spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-13: me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143a-14: spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-0: spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen @143b po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-1: sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-2: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-3: rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-4: rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-7: klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-8: byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing sh'akya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas; ;rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-9: bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-10: rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:143b-11: kha dog sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-0: de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub @144a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-1: la rta yis mchod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-2: klu yi bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-3: mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-4: mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa sh'akya thub la der ni mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-5: sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-6: sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-7: de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-8: phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad drug bcur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-9: nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-10: klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-11: gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-12: 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-13: ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-14: chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-15: chos rnams sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing lbu ba lta bur nyam chung la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144a-16: char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-0: me @144b long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad btags nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-1: 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-2: sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis rdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-3: skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-4: byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-5: de dag ji ltar gzigs ba de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-6: ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-7: yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-8: de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-9: shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-10: yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-11: des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-12: khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdza ba la zam pa 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-13: 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul ma ni 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-14: de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:144b-15: skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-0: gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la @145a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-2: sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-5: 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-6: dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yod ma mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-7: mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-8: de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-9: dri ba rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-10: 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-11: rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yod ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-12: de ltar bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-13: de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-14: thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-15: 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145a-16: kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-0: @145b bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-1: 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-2: sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-3: de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-4: drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-5: rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-6: su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-7: 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-8: thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-9: khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-10: 'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-11: de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-12: rgyal pa'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-14: rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:145b-15: klu yi bu mos mchod de 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-0: de yi 'bras bu bstan gyi yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis @146a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-1: nyon; ;gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-2: klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-3: 'gro ba thams cad stong bar rnam gzhig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-4: 'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-5: chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-6: 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag nas shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-7: rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-8: mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-9: byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-10: nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-11: klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-12: sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-13: ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-14: 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-15: lha 'gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146a-16: rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas che tshad zad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-0: dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul @146b zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-1: de dag de ni lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-2: padma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-3: 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-4: skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-5: de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni; ;tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-6: bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-7: mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe chad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-8: de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-9: mkhas pa che zad blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-10: 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-11: chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-12: de dag la gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-13: bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-14: mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-15: bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:146b-16: tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-1: gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-2: de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-3: thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-4: mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-5: bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-6: kun du grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-7: mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-8: bde bar gshegs pa dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-9: tshang pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-10: kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-11: rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum la ma las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston; ;tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-12: tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-13: bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-14: ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147a-15: de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-0: @147b shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-1: phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-2: rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-3: dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-4: lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzang dag dang lha min bcas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-5: dri za grul bum mi'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyang chos kyi stobs rnyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-7: de dag thams cad yi rang thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la ma gos phyag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-8: klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-10: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-12: yongs su rdzogs par rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-13: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-14: bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:147b-17: mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-2: mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-3: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-5: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-6: 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa rgod pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-7: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-10: mthun par zhugs pa 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-12: gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-15: ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir dzambu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148a-16: spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-0: bcom ldan 'das la @148b mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-1: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal bar bkang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-2: klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-3: klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-4: klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-5: rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang beed'u rya'i dra bas legs par brgyan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-6: 'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-8: 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb aar mo ni ga ltar 'jam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-12: kha dog bee d'urya ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-13: ka tsa lendi ka ltar reg na bde ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-15: sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-16: lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:148b-17: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas nor bu la la las ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-10: chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-11: nor bu la la las ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-13: nor bu la la las ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-14: de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-18: me long gi bya ba byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-19: 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-20: ser skye'i gnas nas sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-21: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-22: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-23: 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par thon par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-24: rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-25: ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149a-26: me tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-0: spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs @149b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-1: rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-2: mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-3: me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-4: rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-5: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thon par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-6: de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du dkri ste rkang gis dong na bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nor bu rin po che ka tsa lindi ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-8: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-9: 'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par thon pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-10: klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:149b-11: de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum pa bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam par rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzum par blta la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-0: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag @150a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-2: de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-3: mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-4: dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can; ;rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-5: bde gshegs khyed ni grong khyer mngon par byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-6: lo drug par du dka' thub dka' mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-7: rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-8: bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-9: thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-10: ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-11: 'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-12: 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-13: de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-14: thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-15: byang chub sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-16: bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-17: de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150a-18: gang tshe ka ling rgyal po bzod smra bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-0: zhabs @150b dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-1: de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-2: de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-3: phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-4: gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la bcal gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-5: rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-6: bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-7: bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci zhe na; ;bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-8: ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-9: sdug bsngal spyod pa dran sa pa mi dga' lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-10: ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-11: bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-12: sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-13: 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod bde bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-14: mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-15: thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-16: ji ltar khyod kyi bzhin du spyod 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-17: de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol; ;rga shi ma mchis go 'phang mthor 'tshal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-18: klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa skom par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-20: brtul zhugs spyod pa bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:150b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-0: lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs @151a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-1: su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-5: kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-6: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-8: brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-9: rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-10: 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-11: mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-12: tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-13: 'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-14: yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-15: mkhas pa the tshom rnam par bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-16: 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa sh'akya thub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-17: de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-18: gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-19: rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-20: tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151a-21: bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-0: bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam @151b pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-1: sh'akya sengge bka' stsal the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-2: sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-3: 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-4: tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-5: 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-6: de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-7: rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-8: bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-9: gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa; thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-11: tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-12: rta thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-13: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-14: klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-15: 'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-16: skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-17: sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-18: snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-19: 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-20: 'gro ba byang chub rgya chen thob bya la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-21: 'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-22: zhi gnas dge ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-23: mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:151b-24: rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-2: 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-3: gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-4: mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-5: 'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-6: snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-7: 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-8: rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-9: de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-10: rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-11: 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la 'jug pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-12: de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-13: de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-14: 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-15: rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-16: bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-17: bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-18: srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-19: rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-20: mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-21: yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-22: thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-23: skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152a-24: 'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-0: dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes @152b par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-1: phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-2: rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-3: de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-4: bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-5: de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-6: bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-7: bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-8: 'gro ba 'chi med yang dag thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-9: de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-10: rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-11: mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su dgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-12: tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-13: klu yi bsam pa sh'akya sengge la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-14: yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-15: gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-16: ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-17: klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-18: rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-19: de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur nas; ;dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-20: klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-22: de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:152b-25: klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153a-0: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te @153a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153a-4: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153a-8: rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153a-9: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs la /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153b-18: gdugs de dag la rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153b-19: 'di lta ste; gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:153b-22: shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-0: mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi @154a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-2: klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-9: rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-12: bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-14: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-15: thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-16: thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-17: ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i ri 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-18: mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-19: 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-20: tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-21: 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154a-22: shes rab ldan pa dregs pa yong mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-0: @154b rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-1: rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dag 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-2: chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-3: bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-4: dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-5: grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-6: gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-7: de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-8: mchod pa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-9: shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-10: me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-11: brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-12: 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-13: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-14: rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-15: rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-16: nad dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-17: skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-18: byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-19: gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-20: bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-22: thub pa'i 'khrugs med chos rnams rab stan pa; ;mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:154b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-1: nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-2: ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-4: ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na //
