K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-6: rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-7: 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-8: the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-9: mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-10: gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-11: de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yab mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-12: deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-13: mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-14: de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-15: gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-16: gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g-yo gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-17: rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-18: de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-19: thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-20: 'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-21: the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-22: 'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155a-23: 'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-0: 'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom @155b sol; ;rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-2: rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-3: 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-4: 'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-5: de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-6: grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-7: zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-8: mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngoms gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-9: zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-10: de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-11: zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-12: lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-13: bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-14: snying rje bas ni nga la mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-15: rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-16: mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-17: grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-18: brgya byin lha yi drung du 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-19: thugs thub byams don mdzad ston drung du 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-20: des ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-21: phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-22: de dag bskal pa gangg'a'i bye snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-23: zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-24: bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:155b-25: go cha chen po rab tu bgo byed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-0: de dag skye bo med par @156a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-2: khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par spyad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-3: skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-4: ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-5: de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-6: der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-7: de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-8: ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-9: rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa zhing sbyong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-10: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-11: de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-12: 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-13: de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-14: bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-15: grub bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thob nas; ;'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-16: grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-18: de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-22: grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-23: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156a-24: yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-0: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas @156b chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang dag par bka' stsal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-1: bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-3: chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-5: snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-7: rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-8: glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-9: glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-10: mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-11: so re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-12: rdzing bu re re zhing yang padma bdun bdun /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-13: padma re re zhing yang 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-14: 'dab ma re re zhing lha'i bu mo bdun bdun /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:156b-15: lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun zhing padma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-0: glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag gi mgo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs @157a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-1: nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gdugs byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-3: glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-4: de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la zhon te lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-5: bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsandan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-7: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-8: lha'i aa ga ru'i phye ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-9: lha'i ta ma la'i phye ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-12: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-13: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-15: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-17: pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-19: mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-21: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157a-28: rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-0: sprul pa'i me tog @157b rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-2: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-3: spos kyi bla re de dag la spos kyi ngad 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-4: lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-5: spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po 'khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-6: spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-7: rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-8: de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po che sa srung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-9: gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gi mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-10: lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-15: ta ma la'i lo ma'i bye ma 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-17: lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:157b-19: me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-0: @158a *// mand'a ra ba chen po nas skya snar khra bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-1: skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-4: gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-7: rin po che snyim pas blangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-13: gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-16: la la ni; rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-17: rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-19: lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te; lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-20: de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de dag la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158a-21: yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyog [*phyogs?] gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-0: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par @158b bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-1: bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-2: srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-3: khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-4: khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-5: mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-6: grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-7: 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-8: dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-9: bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-10: brjod pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-11: tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-12: 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod kyis 'gro ba sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-13: bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ong med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-14: gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-15: chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-16: rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-17: chos rnams gang yang bya ba med ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-18: 'jig rten gtso bo bya ba'ang yongs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-19: bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-21: shing rta yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-23: bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-24: shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:158b-25: de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-1: la yongs su bskul mi bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-2: chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-3: chos rnams chos la nye bar mi brten te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-4: chos rnams gang yang ma skyes mchi ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-5: 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-6: kun rdzob de yang de ni ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-7: 'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-8: tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-9: mig gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-10: bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-11: chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-12: 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-13: de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-14: nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-15: chos kyis chos kyi tshul la bzung bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-16: zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-17: rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-18: 'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa; ;thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-19: bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-20: ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-21: nga rgyal bsgrubs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-22: 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159a-23: mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya las yongs su dgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-0: ji ltar bde gshegs @159b khyod bzhin bdag cag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-1: 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-2: g-yo yi zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-3: yongs 'thob spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol; ;ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-4: 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-5: sna tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-6: bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chud zin dgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-8: bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-9: 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-10: bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-11: nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-12: bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-13: skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-14: 'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-15: thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-16: bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-17: the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:159b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-0: mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa @160a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-1: mdzad; ;su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-2: blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-3: gang gi blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-4: bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-5: 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-6: bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-7: sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-8: dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-9: nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-10: dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-11: 'gro ba yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-12: rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-14: 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas bshad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-15: khyod kyis don dris mthun zhing legs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-16: 'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-17: skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-18: 'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-19: rnam par 'dren pa 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-20: de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-21: bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-22: dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes bsnyegs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160a-23: bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-0: chos nyid @160b 'byung bar 'gyur ba med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-1: chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-2: rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-3: rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-4: gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-5: des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-6: de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-7: rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-8: byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-9: dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-10: nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-12: 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-13: dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-14: blo gros bzang rnams lha rnams lha yul pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-15: brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-16: de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-17: bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-18: zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-19: de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-20: de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongs su skyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-21: de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-22: rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-23: khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-24: 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-25: bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:160b-26: rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-0: rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs @161a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-2: sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-3: sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-4: bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-6: rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-7: de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-8: rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-9: dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-10: dri za lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-11: de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-12: der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-13: sh'akya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-14: dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-17: de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-18: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-19: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos nas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-0: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar @161b rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-2: mngon shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-4: de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-5: mi yi sengge khyod la 'di ltar bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-6: ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-7: gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-8: shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-9: tshad gzung dag par nus pa yong ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-10: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-11: skye bo drang rung mi rung btul min pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-12: de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-13: de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-14: de dag ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-15: de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-16: de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-17: de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:161b-18: 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-9: 'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-11: lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-12: de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-13: mi yi sengges lta ba ci 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-14: gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-15: gang la brten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-16: de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-17: de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis; ;ci 'dra'i lam la de dag brten bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-19: ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-20: byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-21: rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-22: bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162a-23: de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-0: 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas @162b bgyis pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-1: dmyal ba chen po ji srid gnas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-2: ci 'dra sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-3: de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-4: gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-5: rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-6: chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-7: mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-8: 'gro rgyud kun tu smon pa rnams spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-9: lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-10: phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-11: byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-12: mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-13: mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-14: de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-15: 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-18: mi yi sengges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-19: mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-20: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-21: 'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-22: ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:162b-23: bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-2: 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-3: de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-4: gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-5: gang gis sems ni bsgul nas gnas par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-6: de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-7: de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-8: kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du blta zhing sdod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-9: ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-10: de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-11: de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-12: gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-13: gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-14: de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-15: rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-16: the tshom 'tshal ba yid gnyis legs bsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-17: de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-18: dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-20: rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-21: de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-22: rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163a-23: ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyed kyis legs par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-0: de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan @163b par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-1: gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-2: 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-3: dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-4: rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-5: gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-6: 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-7: byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-8: chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-9: mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-10: 'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnams spangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-11: byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-12: rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-13: kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-14: srid pa kun tu chu la padmo bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-15: byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-16: de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-17: stong par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-18: de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-19: byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-20: skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-21: de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-22: dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-23: zhi ba bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-24: phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-25: byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:163b-26: gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-3: shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-4: shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-5: byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-6: stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-7: mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-8: smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-9: de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-10: de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-11: dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-12: rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-13: zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-14: gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-15: 'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-16: gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-17: mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-18: de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-19: zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-20: blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-21: de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-22: de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-23: mtshan ma med par spyod cing dong gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-24: 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-25: 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164a-26: de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-0: @164b byang chub bla med de yang thob gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-1: de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-2: sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-3: sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can; ;de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-4: zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-5: tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-6: de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'byung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-7: rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-8: kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thos par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-9: 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-10: de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-11: rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-12: ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brtan brtsams te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-13: kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-14: gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-16: de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-17: gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-18: lung bstan pa yang thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-19: khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la; srog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:164b-25: bdag gi yang gang yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-1: gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-3: skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-4: las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-6: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-7: sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-8: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-10: ci zhig las dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-12: ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-13: sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-14: sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-16: der skye zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-20: sems can rnam par dgod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-21: bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-23: bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165a-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-2: de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-3: zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-4: ci zhig las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-6: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-7: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-8: rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-9: shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-10: stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-11: bde gshegs bdag gis ma 'tshal ba; ;gsung ba'i zla ba thos kyi dbyings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-12: 'gyur ma mchis la stong ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-13: rang bzhin med gzung ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-14: mchod pa 'di ni gang zag mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-15: skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-16: sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-17: skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-18: ldem po dag de bdag ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-19: mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-21: de ni yang dag lung bstan pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-22: thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-23: sgyu ma 'dra la lha skye zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-24: gsungs pa de ni 'di lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:165b-25: ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-1: 'tshal; ;gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-2: dge bshes bsten gsum ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-3: ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-4: skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-5: g-yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-6: rkang gnyis mchog gsungs ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-7: ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-8: dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-9: rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-10: rtogs zhes mgon gsung ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-12: shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-13: zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-14: chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-16: bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-17: sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-18: nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu; ;chos ni rab tu spangs bgyis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-19: mi mkhas dmyal lhung ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-20: brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-21: 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-22: las de bgyis pa ma mchis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-23: rang las can gsungs ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-24: bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-25: zil gyis mi gnon bdag ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-26: mgon po de la bdag dogs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-27: bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-28: dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-29: byang chub yang dag sgrub pa'ang gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166a-30: dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-0: de skad bka' stsal bdag @166b ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-1: chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-2: spong byed las ni zad bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-3: tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-4: bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-5: yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-6: ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-7: 'di yang rab rib bral ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-8: spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-9: thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-10: gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-11: sel nus ma mchis de lta bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-12: bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-14: stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-15: bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa; ;gal te 'ga' zhig mi ston na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-16: rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-17: ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-18: rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-19: 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-21: me long shin tu yongs dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-22: ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-23: gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-24: ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-25: chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-26: mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-27: yan lag rnams la brtags byos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-28: ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:166b-29: chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-3: blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-4: skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-5: de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-6: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-7: gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-8: byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-9: 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-10: log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-12: de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-13: sems med chos ni ngas bshad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-14: byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-16: byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-17: byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-18: zil gyis ma non rang byung sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-19: rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-21: de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-23: gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-24: gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-26: dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-28: sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-29: ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa; ;mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-30: skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-31: gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167a-32: dge bshes bsten ces gang smra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-0: gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i @167b phyir; ;gnas pa med pa'i dge bshes bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-1: g-yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-2: bstan pa ma 'tshal ces smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-3: shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-4: shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs; ;mi gang bdag yid khas len cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-5: bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-6: de dag la ni bya ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-7: g-yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-8: rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-9: rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-10: byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-11: rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-12: de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-13: rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston; ;kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-14: yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-15: zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-16: zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-17: mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyi; ;kun tu rtog las sred pa skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-18: skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-19: kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-20: mi mkhas de ni rtog pa'i rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-21: yod pa min la log par brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-22: chu yan par ni mthong gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-23: smig rgyu la ni chu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-24: de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-25: sdug pa min la sdug par rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-26: byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-27: sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-28: sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-29: smig rgyu la ni chu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-30: de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-31: gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:167b-32: byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-2: chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-3: spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-4: med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-5: mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-6: rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-7: bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-8: de dag stong zhes thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-9: bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-10: de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-11: nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-12: stong pa gya nom spong byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-13: mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-14: mtho ris 'jigs pa ngas bstan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-15: skye ba'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-16: las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-17: byed pa po ni rab tu bkag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-18: yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-19: rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-20: rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-21: log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-22: ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-23: byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-24: shing rnams rlung gis bsgul ba las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-25: me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no; ;bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-26: rlung dang shing la sems pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-28: las kyi byed po de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-29: bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-30: byang chub yang dag sgrub pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-31: legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-32: de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-33: mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168a-34: de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-0: lo la phung @168b por spungs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-1: sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-2: zad pa med ces gang smras dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-3: las zad ces ni ngas smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-4: stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-5: tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-6: yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-7: phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-8: log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-9: gang dag mtha' ni mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-10: mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-11: mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-12: ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-13: nges par ljon pa khyod nyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-14: yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-15: byang chub blo ldan rnams la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-16: chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-17: aa yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-18: de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-19: mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-21: aa yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-22: chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-23: aa yi chos la 'jug par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-24: aa yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-25: de yang ljon pas shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-26: chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-27: de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-28: chos kun 'gyur ba med par yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-29: aa ni chos kun sgo mor bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-30: aa yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-31: ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-32: mi zad pa dang zad smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-33: chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-34: stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-35: mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-36: chos rnams kun la sgo med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:168b-37: de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-0: @169a *// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-1: aa la brten nas 'jug par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-2: chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-3: yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-4: aa yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-5: de yang ljon pas shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-6: chos kun lus med byang chub ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-7: blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-8: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-9: aa la brten nas 'jug par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-10: chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-11: med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-12: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-13: aa la brten nas 'jug par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-14: chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-15: med pas de dag gdags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-16: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-17: aa la brten nas 'jug par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-18: chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-19: med pas de dag rang bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-20: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-21: bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-22: gzungs kyi sgo mo nga la nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-23: chos kun yid la bya ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-24: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-25: bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-26: med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-27: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-28: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te; ;aa la brten nas shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-29: chos kun thogs pa med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-30: thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-31: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169a-32: aa la brten nas 'jug par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-0: @169b chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-1: mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-2: chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-3: de dag ming med shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-4: chos rnams yang dag ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-5: de dag ma lus rang bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-6: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-7: aa la brten nas shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-8: gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-9: de dag mthong med bstan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-10: lta ba po ni med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-11: de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-12: chos kun mnyam med de bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-13: mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-14: nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-15: chos kun yod pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-16: de lta lhag med chad pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-17: mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-18: gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-19: blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-20: drang po ma yin yon po min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-21: mun pa ma yin snang ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-22: mthong ba med cing thos med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-23: med pas gzungs su shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-24: g-yo med drang po'ang med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-25: chos rnams gsal med g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-26: 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-27: ci yang mi byed nyer zhi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-28: skye ba med cing gnas kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-30: nyal ba med cing mi nyal med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-31: sad pa med par shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-32: mig can ma yin long ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-33: lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-34: sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-35: dul ba ma yin ma dul min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:169b-36: rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-2: bden min rdzun min de lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-3: rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-5: 'di la the tshom gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-6: gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-7: dam pa'i don du byung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-8: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-9: gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-10: khang pa brtsegs pa shing la brten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-13: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-14: gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-18: lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-19: mi 'am ci'i rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170a-21: chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas mi'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thang las skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-0: chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis @170b bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-2: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-3: de nas khang ba brtsegs pa de dag las babs te rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-7: bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-8: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad; ;lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-9: 'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-12: zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-13: smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-14: bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-15: gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-16: bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-17: mi mchog dam pa the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-18: bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-19: dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-20: ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:170b-21: smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-2: bcom ldan stan thos yid dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-3: the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-4: ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-5: de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-6: 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-7: the tshom gcad slad ljon pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-8: mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-10: skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-11: sangs rgyas yon tan bsten 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-12: ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-13: rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-14: ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-15: bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-16: de khyod dang ba'i yid kyis nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-17: skye med yid kyis nga la nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-18: 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-19: ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-20: de yi 'bras bu brjod par bya'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-21: the tshom gcad pas nga la nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-22: ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-23: bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-24: de dag nga la mchod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-26: bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-28: mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-29: sems la dbang bsgyur dbang ldan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-30: mi yi sengge de dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171a-31: sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-0: sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas @171b na; ;bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-1: bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-3: rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-5: rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-7: chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-8: stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-9: de dag zhing du sems can gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-10: yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-11: nyan thos theg pas gang 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-12: kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-13: mi yi sengge zhing der ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-14: byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-15: de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste; ;mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-16: gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-17: bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-18: yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-19: de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs; ;sems can rlabs chen de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-20: smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-22: bsam pas rang bzhin rnam pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-23: nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-24: zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-25: dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-26: ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-27: de dag zhing du rnam kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-29: zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-30: sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-31: de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-32: mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:171b-33: lung bstan de thos 'khor rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-1: kyang yid ni rangs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-2: mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-4: de nas lha phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-5: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-6: de dag gis ser skye'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog mand'a ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-7: de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-8: zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-9: srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-10: bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-11: 'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-12: sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-14: zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-15: thugs rjes can la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-16: ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-17: mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-18: de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172a-20: dpag tu med pa'i dge spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-0: dpag med ye shes phung po @172b ldan; ;gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-1: blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-2: stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stug pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-3: de bzhin mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-4: rgyal ba bco brgyad chos dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-5: the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-6: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-7: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-8: dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-9: bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-10: tshul khrims stobs kyis mthar phyin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-11: ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-12: ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-13: bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-14: ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-15: ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-16: zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-18: skyes bu sengge bde gshegs khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-19: gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-20: bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-21: chos rnams 'dir ni thos par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-22: ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-23: bsam mkhyen dad mdzad de bzhin du; ;'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-24: lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dad bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-25: de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-26: snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-28: srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-29: bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:172b-31: 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgyas nyen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-0: srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar @173a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-1: bgyid; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang bo can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan ba rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-3: bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-4: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-5: stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-6: rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-7: rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-8: 'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-11: don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-12: bka' stsal bka' stsal 'dren pa mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-13: dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-14: the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-15: gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-16: gang gis deng mchod bla med gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-17: su zhig de ring gting thob gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-18: bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-19: de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-20: dkrugs g-yeng kun tu dkrugs par bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-21: deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-22: rab tu dga' yid ldan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-23: rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-24: 'gro ba'i the tshom myur du khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173a-26: kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan @173b ba rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-1: phreng ldan glang po can lha yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-2: lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-3: dris na 'gro ba mang po yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-4: don chen shin tu deng byas gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-5: stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-6: sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-7: de ni 'gro ba mang don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-8: de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-9: phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-10: nga la sems dad nga mchod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-12: nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-14: mthun par mi yi nang skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-15: rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-16: me tog mchog gi mchod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-17: kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-19: rang byung mi yi sengge la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-20: tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-22: rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-23: me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-24: mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-25: de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-26: mthu po che yi sku bstod nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-27: rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-29: grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-30: brgyad khri bo rnams de dag kun; ;bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-31: me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-32: de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:173b-33: ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-2: mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-3: phreng ldan glang po can lha yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-4: longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-6: 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-7: de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-8: mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-9: de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-10: skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-11: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-12: gangg'a'i bye ma rab mang snyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-14: gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-15: grags pa ma smad de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-16: ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur; ;de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-18: grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-19: ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-20: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-21: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-22: phreng ldan gling po can rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-23: lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-24: thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-25: de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-26: phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-28: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174a-29: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-1: yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po ba skyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-4: kham pa'i gru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu yi dbus su phyin na; gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skye ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-5: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te; de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-6: de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-10: rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-11: lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-12: de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas rol mo'i sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-13: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-14: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-16: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-18: pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:174b-19: sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-1: tu gtor te de dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-2: rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-3: lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-4: 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-5: thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-6: rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-7: 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis; ;mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-8: rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-9: khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-10: mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-11: sred pa'i phur pa rab tu phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-12: nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-13: khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-14: rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-15: khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-16: 'dren pa khyod ni rma rnams sos; ;khyod kyis nyon mongs thams cad spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-17: bcing ba dag ni thams cad bcad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-18: sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-19: thub pa chags pa kun las 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-20: rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni; ;stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-21: bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-22: rnam pa kun tu mi mnga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-23: khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-24: ma rig pas ni thugs kyang byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-25: rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci log /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-26: rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-27: gang du 'jig rten mi chud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175a-28: ri dvags rngon pas ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-0: yang dag mtha' ni khyod @175b kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-1: sems can 'jig tshogs ltar lhung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-2: stong pa nyid ni ma 'tshal bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-3: ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-4: 'khor ba'i brtson rar dga' bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-5: khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-7: gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-8: ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-9: phung po stong par rnam par bshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-10: mig dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-11: khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-12: bdag med stong par rnam par bshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-13: chos gang dang ni ming gang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-14: chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-15: chos de chos des stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-16: thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-17: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-18: skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-19: de la sems can gdags ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-20: srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-21: de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-22: dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-23: yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-24: skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-25: ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-26: bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-27: mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-28: lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-29: byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-30: de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-31: de bzhin chos dbyings nyams lags na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-32: byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-33: gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:175b-34: legs bslab rmongs par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-2: de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-3: shes rab chen po khyed kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-4: ye shes sgron ma rab bus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-6: sems can rnams la chos bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-7: de ltar bdag cag myur du ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-8: bla med byang chub zhi thob ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-9: de ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-10: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-12: 'khyams gyur pa yi sems can la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-13: ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-14: bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
