K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-17: rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-20: dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-22: bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-23: yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-24: kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-25: de ring su yis bdud pham bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-26: nem nur gang gis gcod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-27: su zhig de ring chos rtogs 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-28: skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-29: de ring khyod la su yis mchod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176a-30: ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-1: rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-2: ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-3: lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-4: 'gro ba the tshom chad 'gyur ba; ;'dren pas de ltar lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-5: ci nas rnam pa thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-6: kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-7: myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-8: de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-10: 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la; ;'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-12: rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-13: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-15: nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-16: dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-17: dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-18: mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-19: de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-20: shin tu dad pa'i yid kyis byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-21: sangs rgyas mngon par bstod par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-22: stong pa nyid kyang shes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-23: chos rnams la ni nges pa rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-24: nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-25: sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-26: brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-27: ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-28: bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:176b-29: 'dren pa de dag ji srid du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-0: sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod @177a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-2: bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-3: de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-4: de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-5: kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-8: 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-10: blo yi mchog dang ldan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-12: sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-13: mi rnams de yi dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-14: lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-15: srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-16: shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-17: nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-18: lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-20: sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-21: 'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-22: mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-24: mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-25: rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa; ;rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-26: sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs rgyas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-27: 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-28: mchod rten de dag thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-29: srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-30: khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177a-31: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-0: rang byung mya ngan @177b 'das nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-1: de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-2: lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-3: brgyad cu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-4: chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-5: bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-6: 'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-7: sh'akyas yongs su smin mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-8: rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-9: 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-10: de thos nas ni skye bo kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-11: kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-12: sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-13: ston pa la ni mngon par bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-14: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-17: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-25: phreng ldan glang po can dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-26: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-27: lung bstan pa yang thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-28: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-29: yid bde ba skyes nas yid byung ba chen po skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:177b-30: 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-1: dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-4: mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-5: bee d'urya'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-6: gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-7: nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-8: sa gnas rim pa brgya dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-14: ba dan dag gis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-15: lha rdzas kyi sengge'i khris brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-17: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-18: lha'i rol mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-19: lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-20: rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-23: ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-24: ser skye'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-25: lha'i mchod pa dag gis rgyas par gang bar byas so; ;glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178a-26: glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-0: glang po che sa @178b srung gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-1: so de dag re re zhing rdzing bu bdun bdun /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-2: rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang padma stong phrag bdun bdun /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-3: padma re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-4: 'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-5: lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-6: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-7: dbus su glang po che sa srung gi bu dag btsud nas phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-8: rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsandan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-11: ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-12: gser phye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-13: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-14: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-16: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-18: pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-21: sprul pa'i me tog dag gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-29: rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:178b-30: lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-0: lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod @179a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-2: glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-3: rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-4: lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-5: shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-6: lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-13: lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-14: de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-15: ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-16: chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-17: snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-18: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-19: sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-20: snyam du sems par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179a-21: de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-0: de dag de ltar the tshom @179b med cing nem nur med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-1: de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-2: bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-3: mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-5: de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-6: zhes bya bar shes nas the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-7: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-8: 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-9: sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-10: lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-11: 'di ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-12: 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-14: 'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-15: de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-16: bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-17: ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-18: rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-19: 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:179b-20: rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-0: @180a *// byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-1: de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-2: bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-3: slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-4: bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-5: de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-6: bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-7: bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-8: bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-9: de dag rnams kyang sprul 'drar bcom ldan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-10: bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-11: gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-12: rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-13: byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-14: khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-15: bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-16: stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-17: ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-18: sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-19: 'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-20: gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-21: sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-22: de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-23: bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-24: sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180a-25: gang tshe go 'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-0: bdag cag rtogs @180b nas the tshom thams cad spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-1: sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-2: bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-3: bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa rnams; ;the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-6: gzhal med grags mang mtha' yas gzi brjid can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-7: bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-8: rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-9: rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-10: rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-11: byung bar rigs nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-12: 'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-13: 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-14: lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-15: rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-16: bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-17: rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-18: zla 'drar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-19: ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:180b-20: mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dgar 'gyur bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-0: rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal @181a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-1: gsol; ;bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-2: sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-3: stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsal te; ;rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-4: skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-5: thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-6: rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te; ;dgongs pa rig nas rgyal chen rtsom par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-8: lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-9: rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-10: smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-11: 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-12: lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa; ;des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-13: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-14: dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-15: lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni; ;ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-16: chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-17: rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-18: srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-19: mi yi gtso bo gangg'a'i bye snyed mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-20: sring rgyud de na 'di dag thub pa las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181a-21: chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-0: 'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir @181b byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-1: chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-2: bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-3: chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-4: lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te; ;chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-5: bskal pa padma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-6: smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-7: khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-8: bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-9: chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-10: 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grol bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-11: bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-12: chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-13: zhi gnas de la su brten bag yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-14: myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-15: sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-17: de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar du de dag gis mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-18: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-19: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-20: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:181b-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-4: las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-5: zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-6: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-7: don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-8: shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-10: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-12: legs par mngon du mdzad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-13: de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-15: 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-16: don dam pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-18: shes par bya ba ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-19: rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-20: yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-29: ma brtags pa; 'dzin du ma bcug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-38: byad pa med pa; rab tu zhi ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182a-42: ma thob pa ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-0: mi snyan pa ma @182b yin pa; gzugs ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-1: gzugs med pa ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-5: 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-6: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-7: rnam par byang ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-17: spros pa dang bral ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-18: 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-22: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa; mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-27: yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-33: chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-34: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-39: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-40: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-45: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-46: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-47: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i chor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-48: gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:182b-49: chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-1: su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-2: chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-3: yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-9: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-12: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-14: 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-15: 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-17: de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-18: de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-24: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-25: 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183a-27: de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-0: de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las @183b khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-1: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-2: rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-3: khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-4: dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-5: kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-6: 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa de gnyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-7: khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-8: de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-9: bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-10: gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-11: bde ba'i don du dad pa skye 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-12: rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-13: 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-14: sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-15: sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dvags dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-16: lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-17: mi yi sengges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-18: rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-19: phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-20: bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g-yo gi tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:183b-21: bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-1: ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-2: mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-3: kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-4: 'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-5: de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-6: 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-7: thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-8: bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-9: thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-10: ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-11: gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-12: nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-13: kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-14: de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-15: mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-16: bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-17: mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-18: de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-19: de dag bder gshegs gsungs ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-20: 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-21: de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-22: sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-23: de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-24: sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-25: 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184a-26: ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-0: sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab @184b spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-1: srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-2: chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-3: stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-4: gang gis thos nas dga' ba skye 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-5: de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-6: ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-7: de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-8: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-9: de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-10: byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-11: skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-12: de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du; ;bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-13: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-15: 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-16: khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-17: mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-18: des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-19: lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-20: 'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-21: rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-22: bde ba nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:184b-23: rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'dir ni mchog ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-1: srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-2: 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-3: snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-4: sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-5: skye rgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-6: bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-7: mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-8: mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-9: the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-10: 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-11: lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-12: kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-13: khyod kyi lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-14: sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-15: 'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-17: 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-18: rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-19: sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-20: skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-21: sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-22: 'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-23: tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185a-24: gti mgu blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-0: gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la @185b dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-1: gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-2: gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-3: de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-4: gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong gyur te; ;mi yi sengge snying rje skyed byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-5: de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-6: autpal phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-7: nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-8: sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-9: de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-10: me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-11: 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-12: bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-13: nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-14: snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-15: rgyal ba mi yi sengge gangg'a yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-16: bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-17: byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-18: dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-19: sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-20: sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-21: de dag mi mchog sems can yang mdzad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-22: chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-23: gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-24: rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-25: mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-26: de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:185b-27: rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-2: de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-3: 'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-4: cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-5: rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-6: rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-7: kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-8: de dag nga la mchod pa rgya chen byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-9: bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-10: skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal ba dam pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-11: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-12: bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-13: nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-14: blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-15: sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-16: 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-17: rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-18: rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-19: lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'; ;'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-21: de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186a-22: lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186b-0: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @186b byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186b-5: 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186b-6: gzugs ni; bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186b-14: byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:186b-29: byang chub kyang spros pa med pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-4: byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-6: rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g-yo ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-7: byang chub kyang g-yo ba med pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-9: byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-10: rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-11: byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-12: ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-16: dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-17: dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-18: de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-35: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-37: byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-39: byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187a-41: lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-0: de ltar chos thams cad @187b rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-1: rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-2: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-3: lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-9: de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-12: mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-13: de la nyal ba las sad na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-14: 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-15: de rjes su dran na yang mi rnyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-16: de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-17: de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-18: byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-21: rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-22: chos de dag gi don ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-24: so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-26: de ltar shes par bya ba yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-27: de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-28: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-29: gang zhig byang chub yin; gang zhig lung bstan pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-30: de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-31: so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:187b-32: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-2: nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-6: sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-7: sangs rgyas kyis chos kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-8: byang chub kyang dmigs su med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-12: bdag cag the tshom ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-14: zhes gsol nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-15: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-16: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-17: gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-18: de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188a-19: rnam thar sgo gsum de ni rnyed gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-0: mtshungs @188b pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-1: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-2: sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-3: chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-4: mi yi sengge phung po dben la dgyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-5: skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-6: byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-7: phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-8: sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-9: de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-10: byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smon de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-11: dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-12: bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-13: bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-14: de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-15: yang dang nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-16: mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-17: gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-18: mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-19: srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-20: dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-21: phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-22: lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-23: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-24: de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:188b-25: skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-1: kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-2: mi yi sengge de ltar gang 'tshal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-3: de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-4: gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-5: byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-6: bcom ldan 'das 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-7: gang rnams byang chub 'tshal cing spyod bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-8: 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-9: 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-10: de 'dra'i blo can byang chub rnyed mi dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-11: phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-12: byang chub rgyal ba rgyal las mi g-yo bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-13: gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-14: de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-15: phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-16: khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-17: lung bstan de bzhin sems dpa' ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-18: gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-19: rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-20: khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-21: byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-22: ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-23: phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-24: skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189a-25: lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-0: de ltar gang 'tshal de @189b dag rgyal ba'i sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-1: gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-2: mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yod ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-3: 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-4: de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-5: rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-6: ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-7: de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-8: 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-9: rnam par 'dren pa bstod pa'i bsod nams gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-10: ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-11: dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba rang byung pa; ;rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par 'grub par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-14: 'dren pa rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-15: stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-16: 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-17: des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-18: sh'akya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-19: 'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te; ;nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-20: kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-21: 'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:189b-22: sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-2: rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-3: 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-4: sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-5: rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-6: kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-7: de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-8: ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-9: sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-10: ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-11: mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-12: the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-13: sangs rgyas slar bsdo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-14: rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-16: rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-17: 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-18: de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-19: de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-20: 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-21: gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-22: nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-23: dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190a-24: 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-0: rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes @190b par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-1: gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-3: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-4: bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-5: de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-6: sngon chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-7: de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-8: skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-9: stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-10: de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-11: 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-12: byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-13: gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-14: byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-15: 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-16: de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-17: lha rnams gang yang de la the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-18: byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-19: de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-20: lha tshogs 'di dag rtog pa'i blo ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-21: mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-22: de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-23: gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-24: g-yo ba med pa de la nem nur med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-25: 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-26: de la'ang lha rnams the tshom yod med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-27: chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-28: byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:190b-29: thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-2: blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-3: kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-4: de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'; ;rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-5: 'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-6: 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-7: rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-8: rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-9: de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-10: bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-11: de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-12: yi rang gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-13: dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-15: de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-16: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-17: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191a-18: yid bde ba skyes nas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-0: de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la @191b 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-4: sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-11: de la ma nor ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-12: tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-13: chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-14: ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-15: 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-16: ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-17: ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-20: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te; chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-22: byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-26: chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-27: byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:191b-28: tha na ma tshams [*mtshams?] med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-4: rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-5: mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-6: de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-8: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-9: rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-10: mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-11: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-14: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-15: mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-17: gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-18: gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-19: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-20: gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-21: mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'tshal bar 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-22: yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-23: 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-24: de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-27: gnyis su ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-29: de la bdag cag som nyi ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192a-32: gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-0: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa @192b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-3: 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-4: 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-5: rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-6: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-7: khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-8: mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-9: 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-10: the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-11: khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-12: 'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-13: byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-14: de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-15: the tshom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-16: byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-17: the tshom som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-18: byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:192b-19: rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-1: spangs byang chub sems dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-2: lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-3: rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-4: de bas rgyal ba thugs rje che bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-5: the tshom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-6: lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-7: 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-9: ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-10: rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa; ;lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-11: bstan par ngas bya'i dang bas kun kyang nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-12: 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-13: thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-14: mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-15: 'khor 'dir sengge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-16: gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la lhung ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-17: de la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-18: de ltar the tshom med pa'i tshul thob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-19: bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-20: nyi ma nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-21: mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-22: de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-23: bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193a-24: skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-0: sems can mtshungs @193b par 'di la the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-1: de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-2: bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-3: ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-4: nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-5: de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-6: ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-7: chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-8: rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-9: de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-10: byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-11: ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-12: sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-13: de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-14: 'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-15: gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-16: sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-17: rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-18: mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-19: gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-20: sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-21: chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-22: de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-23: de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-24: bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan rjod byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-25: de la 'dren pa chog tshul mkhyen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-26: mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:193b-27: de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-2: de bas bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang smra la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-3: 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-4: rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-5: bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-6: de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-7: 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-8: gang dag tshul la 'jug par rab mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-9: mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-10: de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-11: tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-12: gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-13: sha khrag pags la mi lta byas pa bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-14: gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-15: de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de lta min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-16: 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-17: ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-18: da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-19: kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-20: rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-21: 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-22: 'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-23: tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur; ;'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-24: de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194a-25: de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-0: tshul thob rnams kyis sngon @194b bsten myur du thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-1: de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-2: sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-3: sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtse ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-4: tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-5: de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-6: brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-7: rtag tu dge bshes mkhas pa bsten byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-8: bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-10: 'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-11: rjes su yi rang the tshom med gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-12: mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-13: 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-16: de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-17: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-18: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-20: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-21: yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-22: de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:194b-23: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-0: gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa @195a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-2: mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-6: theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-7: rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-9: gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-11: zhes mi spyod ma mos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-12: de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-13: snyam du sems su lags kyang de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-14: lam log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-17: gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-18: lam log par zhugs pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:195a-20: gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:196b-20: spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:197a-3: de bzhin rang rgyal skyob par gyur pa dag /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:197a-5: go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:197a-8: chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:197a-12: ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags //
