K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-0: de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag @200b cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-1: zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-2: zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-3: zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrug ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-4: khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-5: zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-6: yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-7: sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-8: de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-9: 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-10: gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-11: bslab nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-12: 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-13: 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-14: 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:200b-15: de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-1: mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-2: 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-3: thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-4: rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-5: thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-6: gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-7: phung pos 'jigs pa de dag sh'akya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-8: dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-9: chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-10: thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag rab tu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-11: thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-12: de dag sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-13: de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-14: bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pa thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-15: rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201a-16: chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-0: des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam @201b mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-1: zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-2: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-3: mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-4: log par rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-5: ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-6: rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-7: ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-8: kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-9: de la bkres med zas med sems can med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-10: rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-11: skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-12: chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-13: ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-14: de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-15: 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-16: byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-17: 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur pa de med ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-18: 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-19: mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-20: dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-21: tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:201b-22: de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-0: @202a *// pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-1: sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-2: de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-3: phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-4: nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-5: gos gyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-6: de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-7: log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-8: tsandan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-9: rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-10: de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-11: so sor rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-12: ji ltar mi yi dung gi sgra thos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-13: sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-14: rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-15: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-16: ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-17: yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-18: dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-19: drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-20: ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-21: yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-22: nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-23: drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-24: grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202a-25: grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-0: grong @202b khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-1: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-2: skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-3: dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-4: ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-5: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-6: skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-7: sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-8: phyogs su de bzhin 'gags par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-9: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-10: skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-11: thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-12: khyod kyi yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-13: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-14: skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-15: sgra de 'jig rten dga' bar rtog pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-16: ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-17: mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-18: skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-19: g-yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-20: ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-21: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-22: skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-23: sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-24: ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-25: mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:202b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-0: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i @203a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-1: bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-2: 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-4: sh'akya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas; ;lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-5: skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tshom 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-6: bde gshegs zhal bzang de la blta zhing thos par dga' ste sdod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-7: rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tshom dgum du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-8: rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-9: rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-10: bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tshom rgyu de gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-11: rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-12: 'khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-13: bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tshom gcod pa nyan 'tshal na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-14: rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203a-15: thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-0: @203b 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-1: ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-2: 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrag gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-3: de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-4: khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-5: skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-6: de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-7: brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-8: de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrag gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-9: rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g-yo thos nas de yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-10: dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-11: stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa lags par dgongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-13: rta thul nga yis phan ched 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-14: rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-15: de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:203b-16: phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-1: zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-2: bskal pa khrag khrig gangg'a'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-3: kun tu rnam par dge la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-4: de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-5: 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa; ;gangg'a'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-6: de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa tshe ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-7: sred pa sel cing 'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-8: skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-9: bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-10: de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-11: 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni; ;sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zas mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-12: de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-13: g-yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204a-14: de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-0: sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung @204b srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-1: de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-2: mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-3: de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-4: de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing sla yi lam la myur bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-5: de na mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-6: mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-7: zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-8: sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-9: sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-10: de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-11: bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas dang gnas khang rnams na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-12: de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-13: de tshe 'dren pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-14: gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-15: 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:204b-16: de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-0: skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal ba khrag khrig byang @205a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-2: drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di brtsams te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-3: zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-4: tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya cher zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-5: ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-6: de la bslab nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-7: de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-8: de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-9: tshangs pa lung bsten pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-11: de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-12: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-13: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205a-14: yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-0: byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslab pas chos thams @205b cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-1: des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-2: de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-3: thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-4: byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-5: sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-10: nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-13: thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-14: sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-15: chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-17: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-18: rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-19: de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-20: rnam par rtog pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-21: rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-22: gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-23: thams cad du song ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-24: chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-25: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:205b-26: rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-0: chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad @206a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-1: la rnam par mi rtog par aa la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-2: de dag aa'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-11: mi g-yo ba; 'dus pa ma mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-14: rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-16: yongs su grub pa ma mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206a-35: gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-3: sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-9: yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-11: yongs su gtan du ma mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-13: yongs su ma btang ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-16: chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-19: chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-23: chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-26: chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-28: ma 'gag pa yang ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-29: chos gang gis mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-32: mi gnas pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-35: ma btags pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-38: ma spangs pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-41: ma shes pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-44: mi dmigs pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-47: mi stong pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-49: dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:206b-50: dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-1: mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-4: smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-7: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-28: chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-29: rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-30: chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-31: dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-32: chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-33: ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-34: chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-35: 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-37: chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207a-38: 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-0: chos @207b thams cad kyi tshul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-2: chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-5: rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-8: rmi lam gyi bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-11: dngos po ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-12: 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-13: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-17: brag ca la tha snyad mchis pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-21: sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-25: smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-28: me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-29: skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste; bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-30: byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:207b-31: rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-1: du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-3: brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-4: brag ca la bya ba ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-6: de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-9: chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-10: de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-11: bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-12: thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-13: de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-14: bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-15: sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-16: byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-17: de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la brten kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-18: de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208a-19: 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-0: gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug @208b bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-1: blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-2: nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-3: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-4: blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-5: de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa khur yang khyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-6: de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-7: skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-8: bde gshegs khyod kyis aa yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-9: de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-10: bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-11: yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-12: bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-13: myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-14: grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas; ;pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:208b-15: bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-1: kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslab pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-2: grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-3: de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-4: 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-5: de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-6: nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-7: gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-8: grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-9: bcom ldan 'das lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul ba de; ;kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-10: 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-11: las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-12: bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-13: des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209a-14: dge ba'i blo mnga' dgra gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-0: sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams @209b gang byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-1: ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bo rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-2: bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-3: bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-5: tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-6: 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-8: 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-9: bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-10: rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-11: 'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-12: gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-13: rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhan yang bgyid par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:209b-14: des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-0: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol @210a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-2: drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-3: 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-4: the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-5: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun 'byung sras su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-6: 'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-7: 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol; ;bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-8: gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur; ;'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-9: ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-10: bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-11: skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-12: thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210a-13: su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur pa bdag cag de nyan 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-0: rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos @210b shing dag gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-1: tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-3: rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-4: bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-5: spobs ba che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-6: de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-7: 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-8: 'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong byang chub yang dag zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-9: byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-10: byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-11: tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-12: sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-13: de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-14: bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-15: 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:210b-16: bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-1: ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-2: de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-3: de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-4: yangs shing shin tu dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-5: kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-6: bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-7: zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-8: sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrog pa med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-9: de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gangg'a'i bye snyed 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-10: rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-11: gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-12: bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-13: de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-14: rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211a-15: de ni au dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-0: de phyir bla @211b na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-1: shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-2: de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dge de 'dra thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-3: 'khor rnams thams cad yi rang mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-4: khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g-yab mo 'dor bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-5: dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-6: zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-7: bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-8: khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye rgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-9: sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-10: 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-13: de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-14: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-15: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-16: yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:211b-17: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-2: chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-3: ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-4: sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-5: bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-6: sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-7: mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-14: sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-17: lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-21: btson chad ma po la rgyas btab bam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-22: byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-23: dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-24: bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-25: 'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212a-26: 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-1: zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-5: skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-6: byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-7: nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-8: karsha pa ni tsam du gtubs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-9: 'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-10: glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-12: gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-13: bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-14: bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-16: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-17: gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-18: gang gis bdag la sgom blud pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-19: gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-21: bsti stang du byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-22: mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:212b-23: gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-4: rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-6: de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-8: de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la brten cing bsnyen la sgom zhing mang du byed de; de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-9: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrog cing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-10: de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-11: skye ba la dbang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-13: rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-14: yo byad la dbang ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-15: dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-17: tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-19: bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213a-20: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-0: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @213b de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-2: ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-3: 'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-6: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-7: bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-8: chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-10: gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-12: de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-13: dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-14: ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-15: de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-16: thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod; ;'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:213b-17: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-1: brnyan ri khrid 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-3: 'di ni sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-4: mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshag cing stong par rnam bzhag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-5: rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-6: rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-7: byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-8: sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-9: de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-10: des na bde gshegs pa rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-11: bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-12: lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-13: de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-14: des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214a-15: thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal mi gzigs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-0: dgyes pa skyes @214b nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-1: de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-2: des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-3: skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-4: 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-5: sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-6: sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'od khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-7: 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-8: gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-9: thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-10: sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-11: thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-12: de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsung ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-13: bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i sgom pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:214b-14: sangs rgyas tshul 'di ni gnas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-0: 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma @215a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-1: gyur la; ;tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-2: de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-3: sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-4: thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-5: gang gi nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-6: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-7: bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-8: 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-9: sgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-10: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-11: sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-12: gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-13: gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te; ;de bas gang gi bde ba'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215a-14: ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-0: ston pa'i tshul @215b mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-1: 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-2: de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-4: thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-5: 'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-6: yang dag tu ni rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa sgom pa mi dmigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-7: chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-8: thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-9: de dag de na nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-10: 'di na mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-11: des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-12: thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-13: rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgoms zhes bstan; ;thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:215b-14: 'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-1: ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-2: de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-3: de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-4: thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-5: byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-7: 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-8: sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-9: rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-10: brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mthar mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-11: mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g-yo ba ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-12: 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-13: 'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216a-14: gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-0: 'di dag thams cad g-yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag @216b min nyon mongs min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-1: 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-2: sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-3: bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-4: thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-5: 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-6: stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-7: gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma rdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-8: gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-9: mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan; ;sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-10: gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-11: bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-12: rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-13: sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di bstan pa; ;mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:216b-14: bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-1: the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-2: de ltar dge rgyas kyis lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-4: de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa yang thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-6: skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas; ;bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-7: rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-8: 'dzum rgyu don gnyer mi mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-9: ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-10: dpal stug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan pa 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-11: sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-12: chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217a-13: bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-0: de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs @217b shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-1: su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-2: de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-3: rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-4: bdud kyis mi 'phrog blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-5: sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-6: rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-7: bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dad bskyed skye rgu rnams la byams gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-8: byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-9: gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-10: bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-11: 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-12: bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-13: de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-14: 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:217b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-1: rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-2: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-3: khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-4: de ni khyod la bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-5: dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni the tshom med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-6: kun kyang yi rang rab zhi yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-7: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-8: the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-9: de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-10: bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-11: 'di dag bskal pa autpal la la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-12: 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-13: sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-14: de yang bstan gyi dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spangs te nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-15: rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-16: 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218a-17: de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-0: de tshe zhing rnams @218b kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-1: thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-2: thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-3: sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de'i tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-4: ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-5: thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-6: slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-7: ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-8: byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-9: de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-10: rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-11: bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa des thos shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-12: dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-13: 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-14: bdag nyid chen po de tshe shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:218b-15: dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-0: de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha @219a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-1: ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-2: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-3: rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-4: yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-5: chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-6: mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-9: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-13: sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-15: 'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-17: sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-18: de la brtson par bgyis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:219a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
