K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-5: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-6: mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal; ;phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-7: byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-8: shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre 'u thogs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-9: grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-10: khams rnams khams kyi rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-11: dper na brag ca rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-12: des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-13: grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:230b-14: skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-1: zhing byis pa bslu ba chad pa stong ba 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-2: mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-3: dper na 'gron po rgya mtsho chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-4: 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-5: thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-6: mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-7: bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-8: sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-9: thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-10: mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-11: mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-12: rten 'byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-13: rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-14: mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-15: mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231a-16: thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-0: thub pa @231b zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-1: thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-2: de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-3: thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-4: thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-5: thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-7: mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes zhes smras pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-8: gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-9: gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-10: de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs pos yongs su dkris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-11: gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-12: gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-13: de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-14: chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:231b-15: gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-0: de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos dpal @232a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-1: stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-2: de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-3: de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-4: de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-5: ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-6: kha cig yi rang dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-7: 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-9: chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-11: dpal stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-12: rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-13: 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232a-14: rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-0: de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhal nas 'dzum @232b mdzad bsil mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-1: 'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-2: mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-3: de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-4: 'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-5: de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul ba gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-6: mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs bsgrags te the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-7: de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-8: bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-9: 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-10: thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-11: des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-12: rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-13: bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-14: de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:232b-15: des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-1: chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-2: rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-3: tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-4: 'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-6: lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-7: rta thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-8: gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-9: de khyod bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro brtse gcig yid kyis nyon; ;thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-10: rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-11: kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-12: kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-13: kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233a-14: skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba 'grol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-0: 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos @233b don du mdzad par shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-1: 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-2: 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya; ;rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-3: kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-4: des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-5: rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhal du nub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-6: rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-7: 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-8: de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-9: rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-10: sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-11: 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-12: kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par nyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-13: dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-14: 'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:233b-15: blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-1: don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-2: gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyi rta thul khyod kyis nyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-3: gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba byed pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-4: de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-5: 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis bskor ba byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-6: dal gyis g-yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-7: gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na; ;de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-8: thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-9: gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-10: gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-11: gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum bskor byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-12: de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-13: bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-14: rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234a-15: des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-0: de thos gyur @234b nas thams cad mkhyen gyi stan la the tshom med par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-1: 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-2: zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-3: mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-4: de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-5: de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-6: bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-7: da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-8: gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-9: thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed; ;rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-10: de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-11: 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-12: rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-13: sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-14: de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:234b-15: de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-0: gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs @235a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-1: bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-2: legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-3: 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa des ni ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-4: de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-5: de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-6: de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-7: bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin pa de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-8: 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-9: de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-10: de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-11: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-12: de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-13: nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-14: de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-15: bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-16: yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235a-17: mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-0: rkang gnyis dam pa @235b gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-1: thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-2: bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-3: de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-4: rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la; ;yang dag mthong ba'i spyod pa dge ba 'di la kun tu bsten byos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-5: dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-6: 'bras bu che ba'i lha lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-8: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-10: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-11: de nas lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-12: khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-13: btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-14: rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-15: sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:235b-16: lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-2: rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-3: shin tu bslab pas mthar phyin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-4: khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-5: lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-6: khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-7: yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-8: zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-9: bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-10: lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-11: brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-12: stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-13: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-14: brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-15: lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-16: khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-17: de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-18: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-19: bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-20: lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-21: dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-22: yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-23: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-24: shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-25: lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-26: sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236a-27: don spyad mthun pa'i don dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-0: lha'i @236b bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-1: byams chen thugs rje chen po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-2: yun ring dus nas bsgoms mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-3: sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-5: lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-6: nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-7: thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-8: ma thul thams cad dul mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-9: kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-10: lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-11: sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-12: sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-13: sems can kun gyis sems mkhyen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-14: sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-15: lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-16: shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-17: blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs; ;thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-18: mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-19: lha'i bu sems rgyan gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-20: khyod kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-21: sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-22: sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-23: kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-24: lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-25: dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-26: khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-27: khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-28: rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:236b-29: lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-0: khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar @237a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-1: mkhyen; ;sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-2: zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-3: myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-4: lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-5: bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-6: chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-7: pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-9: lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-10: 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-11: gti mug spangs pa zag med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-12: sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-14: lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-15: khyod kyis dam chos shin tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-16: 'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-17: gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes; ;de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-18: lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-19: lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-20: rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-21: de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis; ;bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-22: lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-23: dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-24: mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-25: shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-26: rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-27: lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-28: sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237a-29: de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-0: yang dag @237b mtha' yang rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-1: khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-2: lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-3: gnyis su med pa yang dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-4: dpa' bo dpa' bos rnam par gnon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-5: gang zag zab la zhum ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-6: de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-7: lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-8: mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-9: khyod kyi slob la bslab pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-10: sprul rnams bags pa rnying 'dor bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-12: lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-13: ji ltar mar me mar zad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-14: snying po zad pas zhi gyur bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-15: khyod kyi bstan pa myur thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-16: shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-17: lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-18: gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-19: mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-20: shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-22: lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-23: zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-24: cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-25: nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-26: dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-27: lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-28: khyod kyis zhi gnas bslab pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-29: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-31: sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:237b-32: lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-2: dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-3: shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-4: de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-5: lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par blta bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-6: khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-7: mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-8: ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-9: byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-10: lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-11: shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-12: thub chen khyod las gang slob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-14: sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-15: lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-16: 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-17: ye shes rgya mtsho de thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-18: de dag dri med bde ba 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-20: lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-21: chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-22: thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-23: de 'dra'i ye shes ston bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-24: de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-25: lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-26: gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-27: chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-29: de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-30: lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238a-31: chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-0: rnam par 'dren @238b pa khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-1: de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-2: sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-3: lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-4: chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis; ;sems can ma mchis phan tshun min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-5: lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-6: yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-7: lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-8: bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-9: bar snang lta bur snang ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-10: skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-11: de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-12: lha'i bu ngar 'dzin med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-14: lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-15: g-yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-16: spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-17: lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-18: sgyu ma sna tshogs lags bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-19: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-20: de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-21: thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-22: lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-23: gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-24: gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-25: de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-26: de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-27: lha'i bu yid bzhin rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-28: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-29: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:238b-30: de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-2: lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-3: chos nyid la ni khor yug tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-5: chos nyid de yang brnyes pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-6: de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-7: lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-8: khyod yis chos 'di thams cad ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-9: rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-10: yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-11: de bas thub pas rab rib bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-12: lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-13: mya ngan med cing nyer len med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-14: spros pa med cing rnyog pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-15: chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-16: de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-17: lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-18: chos rnams yang dag ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-20: de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-21: de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-22: lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-23: lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-24: rmongs pa med cing shes pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-25: chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-26: khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-27: lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-28: snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-29: gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-30: bzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-31: khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239a-32: lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-0: yul dang @239b phyogs na mi gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-1: yod dang med pa ma lags par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-2: rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-3: de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-4: lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-5: byis pa rnams kyis blo rmongs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-6: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-7: bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-8: de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-9: lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-10: gang zag sems can ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-11: ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-12: bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-13: de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-14: lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-15: gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-16: mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-17: chos kun mtshan ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-18: rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-19: lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-20: ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-21: smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-22: su la smon lam mchis gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-23: de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-24: lha'i bu ting 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-25: rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-26: gang zhig dgrol 'gyur de ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-27: de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-28: de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-29: lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-30: khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:239b-31: bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-2: su smod de dag mkhas ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-3: lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-4: ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-5: char gyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-6: de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-7: 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-8: lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-9: thub mchog gsung ni don mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-10: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-11: shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-12: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-13: lha'i bu blo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-14: chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-15: ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-16: de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-17: gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-18: lha'i bu sengge nga ros gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-19: khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-20: sengge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-21: mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-22: sengges ri dvags phra mo bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-23: lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-24: bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-25: khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-26: sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-27: bag yod pas ni nges par byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-28: lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-29: bag yod pa la rab gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-30: khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240a-31: stobs bcu gzhal yas sangs rgyas chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu @240b spel; ;lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-1: bag yod pa la brtson rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-2: byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-3: thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-5: lha'i bu bag yod nges par 'byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-6: byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-7: ji snyed thar la brten pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-8: kun kyang khyod la bslab pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-9: ngag yod pas ni nges par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-10: lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-11: bag yod yongs su ma btang bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-12: rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-14: thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-15: lha'i bu bag yod srung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-16: byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-17: khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-18: thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-19: byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-20: lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-21: bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-22: mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-23: dpa' bo chen po khyed kyi sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-24: yab kyi dkor kyang thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-25: lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-26: bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-27: de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-28: dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-29: nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-30: lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:240b-31: sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-2: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-3: khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-4: lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-5: chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-6: de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-7: byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-9: lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-10: sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-11: 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-12: sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-13: rdul 'thul ba la char ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-14: lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-15: sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-16: sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-17: khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-18: sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-19: lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-20: khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-21: zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-22: bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-24: lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-25: zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhir gnas la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-26: dpa' bo chen po sgrol mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-27: ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-28: sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-29: lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gro bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241a-30: ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-0: sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes @241b gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-2: chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-3: lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-4: 'jig rten sgron mas zhi gnas ni; ;sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-5: zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-6: de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-7: lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-8: chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni; ;zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-9: de la chags med spyod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-11: lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-12: bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-13: shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-14: de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-15: de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-16: lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-17: sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-18: lam gzhan dag gis ma mthong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-19: zhi gnas ye shes che thob na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-20: rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-21: lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-22: dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-23: chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-24: de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-25: rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-26: lha'i bu lhag mthong 'byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-27: shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-29: sman pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:241b-30: de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-2: chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-3: yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-4: brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob; ;byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-5: lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-6: gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-7: byang chub mchog tu nges par byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-9: brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-10: lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-11: yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-12: chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-13: byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-14: de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-15: lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-16: mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-17: dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-18: de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-19: pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-20: lha'i bu lhag mthong 'byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-21: chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-22: rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-23: chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-24: rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-25: lha'i bu lhag mthong la brten pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-26: rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242a-27: ye shes la ni brten mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-0: thams cad mkhyen @242b pa brnyes nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-1: srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-2: lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-3: sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-5: srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-6: 'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-7: lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-8: lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-9: chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-11: sa bzang n+ya gro dha skyes 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-12: lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-13: rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras; ;ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-14: byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-15: skye bo mang po 'grol bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-16: lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-17: sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rnam par rol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-18: chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-19: zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-20: thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-21: lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-22: dpa' bo chen pos chos kun ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-23: lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-24: rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-25: de ni rang byung byang chub lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:242b-26: lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:246b-28: srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-12: srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-14: srid par phyir log thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-15: sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-17: srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-19: gang gis srid pa len gyur pa'i //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-22: khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-23: srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247a-28: rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-3: tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-4: lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol pa; ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-5: tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-6: rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-7: de la so so'i skye bo chags //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-10: 'ong ba med la dngos med par //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-22: tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-24: byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:247b-25: de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-5: 'dam las brgal cing sdig med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-7: lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-9: tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-10: tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-12: lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-13: mi rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-14: tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-16: de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-17: lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-19: bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-20: sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248a-25: sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248b-4: rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248b-10: mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248b-12: gang gis sems la sems med shes //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248b-17: gang dag sems la sems med shes //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248b-27: mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:248b-28: bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249a-7: gang gi yid ni chos nyid la //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249a-9: de dag mi dbang sras po ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-2: chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-4: bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-5: lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-6: gang la de dag gnas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-7: 'jigs pa med pa thob med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-8: de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-9: de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-12: chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-13: lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-14: chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-15: lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-16: chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-17: khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-18: mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-19: gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-20: lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-21: sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-22: chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-23: bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-25: lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-26: gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-29: de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:249b-30: lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-3: brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-11: 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-12: chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-14: lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-15: mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-16: ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-17: rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-18: gang la spyod pa de lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-19: lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-20: chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250a-27: sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-3: rang byung nyid du nges par byung //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-19: gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-20: chos nyid la ni rab gnas te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-22: ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-24: mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-26: gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:250b-27: lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-0: gnas dang de bzhin gnas min @251a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-2: rang gis de ni thugs chud nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-3: sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-4: lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-5: sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-7: rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-8: las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-9: lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-10: chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-11: las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-12: gang gis rgyu yis bgyid de yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-13: gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-14: lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-15: ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-16: mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-17: de yi rgyu dang len pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-18: gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-19: lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-22: gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams; ;kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-24: mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-25: las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-26: gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-27: de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251a-29: las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-2: khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-3: lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-4: rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-5: rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-6: rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-7: de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-8: lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-9: rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-10: gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-11: rnam smin so so yang dag rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-12: thams cad stong pa rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-13: lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-14: rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-15: gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-16: khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-17: rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-18: lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-19: rgyu dang las dang len pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-20: gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-21: 'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-22: rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-23: lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-24: rgyu dang rkyen dang las rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-25: rnam par smin pa brten pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-26: de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-27: sengge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-28: lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa; 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-29: khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-30: de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:251b-31: de bas khyod ni do zla med //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-3: gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-4: de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-5: de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-6: lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-7: khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-8: ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-9: sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-10: phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-12: khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-13: bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-14: 'du 'dzi ji 'dra bgyid gyur pa; ;de kun bla na med pas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-15: lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-16: stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-17: 'dren pa de yi khams dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-19: de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-22: bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-23: de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa nges //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-25: lha'i bu khams la brten pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-26: sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-27: 'khor ba de dang khams de dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-28: spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252a-29: mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-2: mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-3: blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-8: khyod la do zla ma mchis so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-12: rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-13: de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-14: lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-15: khams gang la ni brten bgyid cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-17: de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-22: sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-24: lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-25: sems can log pa nyid nges shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-27: phung po gsum po de dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-28: khyod kyis ye shes nges par 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-29: lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:252b-30: sems can yang dag nyid nges te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-3: lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-4: ma nges phung por gyur pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-5: gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-6: de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-7: mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-8: lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-9: sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-10: de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-11: mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-12: kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-13: lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-14: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-15: ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-16: don dam nyid du bstan to zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-19: sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-26: brda yang dmigs su ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-27: lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253a-29: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-10: de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-11: lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-12: ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-13: 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-14: de la mos pa nges 'byung ba //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-21: lha'i bu rkyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-22: ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-23: gti mug khams ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-24: de la mos pa nges 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-25: de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-26: lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-27: mtsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:253b-29: de la mos pa nges 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-2: lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-3: sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-4: mthun pa'i khams ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-5: de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-9: ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-10: mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-11: khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-12: lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-14: gang gis rgyu 'byung nan tan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-15: mos pa de las 'byung ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-16: smad pa med pa khyed kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-17: lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-18: sems can gang gis khams gang la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-19: brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-20: rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-21: des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-22: lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-23: sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-24: gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-25: dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-26: dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-27: lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-28: 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-29: srid par mngon pa 'jug pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254a-30: sred pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-0: de dag smra @254b ba'i mchog gis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-1: lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-2: dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-4: sred pa rnam par gzhig pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-5: rkang gnyis dam pas bsten pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-6: lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-7: dbang po rtul po dur khrod bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-8: rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid; ;rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-9: sred dang bcas pas khyod la blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-10: lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-12: zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-13: sred pa zhi dang dbang po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-14: rnam par gzigs la mngon mi dmigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-15: lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-16: zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-17: gnod sems med dang dben pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-18: dbang po rtul po bsten pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-19: khyod kyi 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-20: lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-21: zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-22: sems can shes pa rjes su skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-23: zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-24: de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-25: lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-26: gnod sems med dang byams pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-27: zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:254b-28: dgra dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-1: po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-2: log par rnam par rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-3: log pa nye bar ston pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-4: nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-5: ldog pas thar bar 'gyur ba gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-6: lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-7: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-8: dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-9: ldog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-10: de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-11: lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-12: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-13: mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-14: rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-15: de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-16: lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-17: sems can gang gis shes pa gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-18: ji tsam yongs su bsgrubs bgyis dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-19: snod du gang rung ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-20: de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-21: lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-22: nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-23: shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-24: de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-25: de bas khyod la mngon par dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-26: lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-27: yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-28: spyod pa rnam par sgom pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-29: nyon mongs nyon mongs rnam dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255a-30: thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-0: lha'i @255b bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-1: dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-2: gang zag gang gi bsam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-3: bcings dang thar dang zad pa'ang shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-4: g-yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-5: lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-6: dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-7: nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-8: gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-9: khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-10: lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-11: sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-12: rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-14: rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-15: lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-16: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-17: chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-18: rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-19: des na thams cad mkhyen zhes bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-20: lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-21: chos rnams gang dag rang bzhin gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-22: chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-23: yang dag ji bzhin thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-24: des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-25: lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-26: log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-27: rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-28: las las skyes par de dag mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-29: des na khyod ni do zla med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-30: lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:255b-31: nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-2: bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-3: des na khyod la do zla med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-4: lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-5: bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-7: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-8: ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-9: lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-10: bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-12: bag yod pa las byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-13: de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-14: lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-15: dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-16: bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-17: ldan dang rnam par byang la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-18: de ni rlung ltar chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-19: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-20: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-21: srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-22: srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-23: des na khyod la do zla med; ;lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-24: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-25: byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-26: 'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-27: des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-28: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-29: sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256a-30: blo mchog gsung tshe gsol bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-0: spobs pa sna @256b tshogs rab mnga' bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-1: rnam par 'dren pa de nges byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-2: lha'i bu sngon mtha' la byang bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-3: sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-4: tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa; ;'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-5: des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-6: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-7: sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-8: dpa' bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-9: thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-10: sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-11: lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-12: byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-13: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-14: sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-15: de la khyod kyis sa bon btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-16: lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-17: bskal pa bye ba brtags mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-18: chos kun sems can med pa zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-19: chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-21: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-22: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-23: gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-24: rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-25: des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-26: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-27: gnas dang gnas min bsten bgyis nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:256b-28: las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-2: bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-3: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-4: khyed kyis sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-5: stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-6: dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-8: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-9: dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-10: sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-11: dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-12: mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-13: lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la so sor rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-14: thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-15: sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-16: khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-17: de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-18: lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-19: bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-20: sngon gyi mtha' la brtags bgyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-21: khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-22: des na mgon la bdag mos lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-23: lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-24: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du; ;sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-25: rkang gnyis gtso bos yon tan gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-26: pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257a-27: lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-1: skye rgu sna tshogs las ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-3: khyod kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-4: lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-5: rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-6: bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-7: de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-8: des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi; ;lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-9: khams gang gi ni sems can gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-10: bsgos par gyur cing las bgyis pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-11: bag chags las dang sems can dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-12: khyod kyis g-yo ba med par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-13: lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-14: bshes gnyen ji 'dra bsten bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-15: las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-17: thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-18: lha'i bu dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-19: las de yi ni bgyis pa gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-20: dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-21: gang gis slad du las bgyis pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-22: de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-23: lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-24: dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-25: las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-26: thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-27: de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:257b-28: lha'i bu dngos po la rig pas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-3: de ni ji ltar grub pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-4: las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-5: lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-6: shes pa gang gis dngos po de //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-8: de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-16: 'gro ba gang du las gang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-17: mchi zhing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-19: de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-20: lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-21: 'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-23: dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-24: de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-27: sngon chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-28: de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-29: bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258a-30: lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-2: las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-3: de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-4: lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-5: chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-6: che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-7: chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-8: de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-9: lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-10: tshe 'di'i las rnams gang lags dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-11: skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-12: lan gsum gzhan gyi gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-13: de dag spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-15: tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-16: las kyi rnam smin mi gang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-17: myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-18: so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen //
