K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-20: gang gis las gang bsags gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-21: skyes nas rnam par smin gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-22: gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-23: shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-24: lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa; las gang bskal pa bye ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-25: phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-26: dus gzhan dag ni yang 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:258b-27: de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-7: las gang dang ni ldan pas na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-12: las ni ji ltar yongs smin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-14: de la stong par rnam par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-15: de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-16: lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-17: thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259a-23: lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259b-4: sems can spyod pa spyad mdzad cing //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259b-7: lan tshvas rnam par bstan pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259b-8: lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa; slob dang mi slob rnam par smin //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:259b-16: phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260a-17: zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260a-22: nor ba rnams la zag 'byung bar //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260a-25: ji ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260a-26: bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260a-27: dga' dang sdug bsngal tshor 'gyur ba //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-16: me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-17: 'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-18: bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-28: mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-29: sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-31: ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:260b-32: de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-0: @261a *// mgon po'i bstan pa de thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-1: bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-2: lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-3: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-4: sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-5: de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-6: de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-7: lha'i bu rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-8: ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-9: sangs rgyas sku gzigs brtags pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-10: de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-11: rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'joms gyis gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-13: 'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-14: rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-15: de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-16: lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-17: ri sul dag na sgra byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-18: brag ca sems can sgra ma lags //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-23: sgra ni brag ca 'dra ba lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-24: 'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-25: byis pa mang po rab tu btsud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-26: lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261a-27: chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-1: nan tan chos las shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-2: de la bdag ni the tshom chad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-3: lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-4: chos don yang dag gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-5: de ni sus kyang ma rtogs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-6: sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-8: lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtogs pas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-10: bag chags dang ni rtogs dang rtog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-14: kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-15: zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-16: ngag dang bshad dang nye du dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-17: ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-18: lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa; khams gsum rnams la ma chags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-19: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-20: bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-21: zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-22: lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-24: gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-26: gnas pa ma mchis bar snang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-27: lha'i bu re ba med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-28: 'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:261b-29: gzugs dang gzugs med gnyi gar min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-0: sred zad khyod la phyag kyang @262a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-1: 'tshal; ;lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-3: khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-4: khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-6: lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-8: khyu mchog dam pa spyod mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-9: sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-10: thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-11: lha'i bu sred pa dang bral gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-12: kun tu sbyor dang bral ba ste; ;yang srid bas pas zhir gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-13: dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-14: dus dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-15: lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-16: chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-17: ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-18: bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-19: yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-20: lha'i bu 'dam las brgal bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-22: srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin brgal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-23: gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-24: yang srid brgal la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-25: lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-26: zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262a-27: re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-0: sangs rgyas sgrib pa @262b rnams spangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-1: don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-2: lha'i bu re ba spangs kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-3: don dang don ma lags pa spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-4: chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-5: bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-6: len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-7: lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-8: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-9: lam gang nyon mongs rim med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-10: sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-11: dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-12: lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-14: khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-15: ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-16: nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-17: lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-18: chos rnams kun la nges pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-19: bsngo ba gang yang yong ma gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-20: ye shes rgya mtsho mi bsnyengs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-21: sengge'i sgra ni sgrog par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-22: lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-23: 'jigs pa kun las yang dag brgal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-24: zug rngu thams cad kun tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-25: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-26: thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-27: lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-28: lha rnams dang ni dri za dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-29: bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-30: khyod kyi chos la brgal mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:262b-31: de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-0: @263a *// lha'i bu sengge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-1: chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-2: sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-3: bdag la chos kyis sus rgol zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-4: bde gshegs khyod la dogs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-5: lha'i bu skrag med kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-6: sengge ri sul gnas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-7: 'jigs pa ma mchis skrag ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-8: ri dvags phra mo yongs btul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-9: spa bkong gnas na nga ro sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-10: de bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-11: mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-12: lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-13: mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-14: lha'i bu thams cad zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-16: sangs rgyas nyid la bsngo bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-17: 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-18: des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-19: lha'i bu sengge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-20: thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-21: chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-23: cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-24: lha'i bu rjes su mthun par skyes kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-25: sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-26: 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263a-28: khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-0: lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis @263b gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-1: sengge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-2: khyod kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-3: srog chags bye ba stong dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-4: byang chub mchog tu sems kyang skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-5: lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjes su mthun gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-6: sangs rgyas rjes mthun brtul zhugs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-7: dpal chen de dag thob chen thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-8: byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-9: gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-10: lha'i bu rjes su mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-11: khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-12: byang chub mchog tu sems btud pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-13: de dag 'jig rten sems can che; ;gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-14: lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-15: 'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-17: srog chags bye ba stong dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-18: byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-19: lha'i bu sems rgyun yongs su dag pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-20: yun ring dus na mi dbang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-21: sangs rgyas bslab la legs bslab pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-22: de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-23: mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-24: lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-25: zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-26: sengge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-27: dam bcas pa la mngon bzhugs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-28: rgol ba 'di na yong ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:263b-29: lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-2: lha dang lha bu mi dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-3: 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-4: des na thub pa stobs dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-5: lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-6: dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-7: ma lus yongs su bas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-8: 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-9: des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-11: khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-12: mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-13: rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-15: 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-16: gti mug bag chags bcas par zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-17: nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-18: sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-19: lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-20: rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-21: bas par 'gyur ba lta ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-22: de la khyod kyis mkhyen kun 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-23: des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-24: lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-25: 'dren pas gang la bslab pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-26: rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-27: thams cad mkhyen pa de slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-28: nyon mongs thams cad ma lus bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-29: lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264a-30: 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-0: rnal 'byor las ni nyams @264b ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-1: des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-2: bag chags bcas par yongs su btsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-3: lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-4: nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-5: bag chags ma lus yongs su bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-6: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-7: cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-8: lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-9: thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-10: nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-11: 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-12: mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-13: lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa; khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-14: khyod la skyon dri yong ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-15: de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-16: lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-17: lha'i bu mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-18: zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-19: skye ba yang skye ma lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-20: thub khyod skye ba tha ma pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-21: des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-22: lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol pa; dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-23: sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-24: mya ngan 'khri shing rnam par bskams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-25: gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-26: lha'i bu shing thags bton gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-27: thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-28: ma rig shing thags rnams kyang bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:264b-29: sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-0: de bas tshon pa bsnyengs mi @265a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-1: mnga'; ;lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-2: srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag brgal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-3: rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-4: khyod kyis snang ba yang dag phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-5: 'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-8: nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bshig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-10: mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-12: khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-13: nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-14: chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-15: dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-16: lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa; sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-17: thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-18: sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-20: lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-21: khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-22: sengge'i nga ro rnam sgrog kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-23: rgyal sras de dag chog med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:265a-24: sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis bsgom; ;lha'i bu chos don du gnyer bas gsol pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-14: lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-16: sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-17: thub pa'i gsung la bstod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-18: yang dag gsungs ba'i rgyu mthun lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-19: lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-20: mi mchog khyod kyi bden pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-21: rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-22: chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-23: rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-24: lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-25: 'dus byas dag ni chos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-26: yang dag ji bzhin lta ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-27: chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-28: mi yi dbang bos rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-29: lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269a-30: ye shes yongs su dag pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-0: @269b bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-1: tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-2: des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-3: lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-4: mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi las; ;ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-7: lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-8: 'gro ba thugs rje bskyed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-9: gang la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-10: de la thugs ni dul bar byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-12: lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol pa; 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyod nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-14: thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-15: mkhyen bzhin kun tu rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-16: lha'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-17: sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-18: sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-19: sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-20: rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-21: lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-22: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-23: brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-24: gang gis gang la mngon spyad pa; ;sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-25: lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-26: byang chub mchog ni tshol mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:269b-27: gang drung khyod kyis sngon spyad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-2: sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-3: lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-4: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du; ;gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-5: sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-6: khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-7: lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-8: sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-9: ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-10: sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-11: rnam pa 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-12: lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-13: sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-14: grangs med dpag tu med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-16: zhus shing sgom pa mdzad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-17: lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-18: 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-19: bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-20: gzigs pas sems can rnams la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-21: sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-22: lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-23: gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-24: rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-25: gnod pa mi zad bgyis pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-26: gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270a-27: lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa @270b 'gro rtogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-1: khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-2: las dang bsam gtan snyoms 'jug dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-3: 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-4: lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-5: 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-7: skye dang las kyi rnam smin la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-8: thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-9: lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-10: brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-11: mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-12: bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-13: 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-14: lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-15: khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-16: dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-17: ye shes mchog ni mi chags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-18: srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-19: lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-20: las dang sems can 'gro ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-21: rnam par smin pa myong ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-22: de dag thams cad ming tsam du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-23: rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-24: lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-25: dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-26: da ltar byung ba thogs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-27: grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-28: 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-29: lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam pa dpyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:270b-30: mi yi dbang pos rnam dpyad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-2: dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-3: nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-4: lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-5: dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-6: ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-7: dngos po thams cad dngos med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-8: rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-9: lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul bas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-11: da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-12: ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-13: skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-14: lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-15: dus gsum sems can thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-16: snying po mchis par ma bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-17: sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-18: brag ca lta bur khyod kyis bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-19: lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-20: 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-21: dus gsum po dag kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-22: sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-23: khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-24: lha'i bu mos pa yongs su rig par byed kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-25: gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-26: byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-27: de dus tshun chad mos pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-28: bri bar gyur par yong mi gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-29: lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-30: 'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271a-31: rab tu rgyun chad mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-0: rtag par @271b khyod kyi mos pa des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-1: khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-2: lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-3: chab las padma ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-4: khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-5: 'jig rten dag gis mi gos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-6: padmar chab kyis ji bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-7: lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-8: 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-9: chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-10: gnyis med gnyis su bgyir ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-11: smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-12: lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-13: gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-14: byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-15: mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-16: brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-17: lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-18: dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-19: thams cad kun tu rjes su 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-20: mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-21: dgongs pa bri ba yod ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-22: lha'i bu sems mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-23: mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-24: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-25: 'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-26: sems can rnams la chos kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-27: lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-28: 'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-29: ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:271b-30: bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyid kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-1: rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-2: lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-3: rnam par grol dang ma grol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-4: gang slad khyod kyis ma brnyes pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-5: mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-6: rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-7: lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-8: thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-9: ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-10: rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-11: yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-12: lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam par spyod kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-13: mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-14: dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-15: spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-16: des na sangs rgyas lags zhes bstod; ;lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-17: srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-18: bde gshegs khyod la chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-19: chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-20: rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-21: lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-23: rnam pa kun tu bsnyel mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-24: mgon po dgongs pa nyer bzhag pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-26: lha'i bu sems g-yeng ba med kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272a-27: 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-0: mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi @272b mnga'; ;ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-1: srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-2: lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-3: bde bar gshegs pa khyod la ni; ;ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-4: mi yi dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-5: ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-6: lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-7: skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la ni; ;'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-9: khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-10: lha'i bu snying po blangs pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-11: sems can snying po bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-12: chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-13: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-14: sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-17: de nas de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-18: kun tu rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:272b-26: phreng ldan glang po che can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-1: ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-3: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-4: chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis su gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-5: nem nur dang the tshom za bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-7: sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-8: kun tu rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-9: khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-10: 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur te; sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-11: 'on kyang dge sbyong goo ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-12: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-13: 'di ltar dge sbyong goo ta ma khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273a-14: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-2: gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-4: zhes smras pa de la ji ltar chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-7: ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtags nas mun pa med par gyur te stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-9: bdag cag dge sbyong goo ta ma khyod la de ltar mngon par dag par gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-15: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-19: kun tu rgyu de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-22: khyod kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:273b-25: bdag cag gis bstan bcos las thos na gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-0: gang 'di pha dang ma gnyis kyang tshogs pa @274a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-3: chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-4: 'dod chags kyang 'byung ba de'i tshe mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-15: ma lags so; ;pha'i sems las byung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-18: pha'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-22: 'di la ji snyam du sems; pha'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-34: pha'i kun tu rtog pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274a-40: mngal na gnas pa de lha las 'chi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-2: mngal na gnas pa mi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-6: gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-11: mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-12: gzugs med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-21: rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-29: mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-30: brtag tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-31: khyod yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:274b-35: gzhan gyi lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus mod kyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275a-5: mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275a-6: de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275a-10: de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275a-18: thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'du shes pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-1: bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-10: 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-13: mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-14: mu stegs can byed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-16: de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-17: zhes khas 'che zhing gang rjes su ston pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-18: log par rjes su ston par 'gyur /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-20: log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:275b-25: mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang sgrol ba de ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:276a-4: de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:276a-6: 'di ltar ba lang rdzi de rab ka la mi mkhas pa'i phyir ro; ;kun tu rgyu dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:276a-7: de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:276a-8: tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:277a-0: @277a *// mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la ngas bshad do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:277a-4: pha zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:277a-5: sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsungs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:278b-26: gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:278b-27: zas gtod na sems mi dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:278b-28: tshong 'dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing tog len pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-0: gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag @279a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-1: ni; de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-3: de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-17: bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-18: so snang ba yin; 'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-21: bdag gzengs bstod pa can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-22: mi shes pa'i stobs can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-23: nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-25: de dag la sogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-26: lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-28: de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-31: ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279a-33: 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-1: shes pa la dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-2: nyon mongs pa chung ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-3: khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-4: rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-6: mdza' bo la gdung pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-7: yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-9: byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-10: tshig gi mthu yod pa yin; gros gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-12: 'thab mo bya ba la mngon par mkhas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-14: skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i mthu yod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-15: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par shes pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-17: de dag la sogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-18: mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin no; ;kun tu rgyu dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-19: de la lha las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-24: phreng ba la dga' ba yin; spos la dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-25: bdug pa la dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-26: glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-27: byug pa la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-28: 'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya chen pos dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-29: rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-30: glu thams cad la dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:279b-31: skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-2: longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-3: de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-4: rgod pa'i ngang tshul can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-6: dga' ba la mkhas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-8: che ba'i ngang tshul can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-10: lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-12: mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-13: phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te; kun tu rgyu dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-14: mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-16: de la mtshan ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-17: rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma de dag las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280a-20: de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-0: sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe zhe sdang la yongs su brten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des sems can @280b dmyal bar skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-1: de'i phyir de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang du skyes te spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag thos nas bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-2: sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-3: zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-4: des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-5: de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-6: byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-7: byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-8: des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-9: byams pa chen po bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-11: de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-12: sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gti mug la yongs su bsten pas des gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:280b-13: de'i phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-0: de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod @281a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-2: des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-4: shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-5: zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-6: de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-7: de dag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-8: des kyang de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-9: yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-10: des de'i gti mug de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-12: zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-13: yang na de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-14: des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-16: de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-17: sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe ser sna la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281a-18: des ser sna dang ldan pa bag chags las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-0: blangs pa @281b des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-1: de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-2: de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-3: des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-5: zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-6: des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste; de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-7: des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-8: yang na de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-9: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-10: de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-12: de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-13: sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-14: nga rgyal la yang yongs su brten pas de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:281b-18: blangs pa des lha ma yin du skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-1: yin du skyes te lha ma yin gyi gnas na gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-2: de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-3: des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-4: lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-5: zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-6: des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-7: de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga rgyal spang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-8: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams stong to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-9: des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-10: yang na de la stong pa nyid ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-11: des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-13: yang na ji ltar bya ba 'byung ba sna tshogs pa las 'byung ba'i tshul ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-14: ngas de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-15: yang na de la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-16: des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-17: de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282a-19: de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-0: sngon @282b mir gyur pa'i tshe'ang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des las de byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-4: blangs pa des mir skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-5: mi'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-6: de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang mi'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-7: de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-9: zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-10: des mi'i spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-11: de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-12: des kyang de'i spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-13: yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi bsngags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-15: des de 'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-16: yang na de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-17: de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-18: de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:282b-19: des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-1: nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-3: de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-4: sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-5: sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-6: tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas las de byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-10: blangs pas lha'i nang du skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-11: de lha'i nang na gnas pa des lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-12: de lha las shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-13: des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-15: zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-16: des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-17: de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-18: mi gnas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-19: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa la smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sbyin pa bsngags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283a-20: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims la smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims la bsngags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-0: des @283b de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-1: yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-2: de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-3: de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-4: de dang ldan pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-6: de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mnyan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-8: thos nas kyang shes cher gnas par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-14: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-18: 'khor bzhi po yod pa dag tu gnas par bya zhing de dag dang 'grogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-19: des 'gro ba byas te goms pa'i rjes su 'gro bas chos thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-20: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-21: zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mthong du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:283b-23: de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te gti mug gi gnyen por bstan bcos la mkhas pa'i skye bo dang lhan @284a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-1: cig dga' bar gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-2: des de'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-4: bstan bcos shes pa de dag rang bzhin gyis yang dag par brtag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-5: de'i phyir de la bstan bcos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-6: bstan bcos shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-8: zhes bya bar snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-9: des de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-10: myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-12: de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-13: gang la brten na sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-14: gang gis de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-15: gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig mngon du 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-16: de bsgoms pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-17: yon tan la brten par bya'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-20: de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-21: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te nyon mongs pa'i 'dud dang 'thab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284a-23: nga rgyal zhes bya ba'i chos de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-0: ci @284b zhig gis yongs su bzung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-3: su zhig de spang bar byed ces de yang dag par btsal na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-4: nga rgyal de mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-5: gang gis de yongs su bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-6: gang la de kun nas langs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-7: gang de spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de yang mi dmigs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-8: yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su bzung bas bdag dang 'jig rten bslus par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-9: des chos thams cad rang bzhin med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-11: zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-12: dngos po med pas yongs su ma grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-13: zhes bya bar rab tu shes so /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-14: yongs su ma grub pas mi skye ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-15: gang ma skye ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-17: gang mi skye 'gag pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-19: zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-20: gang gdags su med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-23: da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-24: gang du gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-26: chud zos pa yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-27: zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-31: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-32: chos nyid gang gis thams cad de bzhin nyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:284b-33: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-1: yin pa de bzhin nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin nyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-3: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-4: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid pas de'i phyir chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-8: da ltar yang 'jig rten brtags pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-9: nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-12: mi las shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-14: mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-15: nga rgyal gyis ni; sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-20: nga rgyal med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-21: de yang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-23: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas shes par nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-24: de nas kun tu rgyu drug khri bo de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285a-26: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-0: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan @285b 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-1: mgon po ye shes stobs kyis yang dag 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-2: 'gro ba kun la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-3: 'gro ba kun na spyod pa rnams gzigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-4: lag pa'i mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-5: 'jig rten lta ba'i rnam pas kun tu dkrigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-6: sprin stug dag gis nam mkha' yog pa bzhin; ;de dag gis ni byis pa rmongs nas spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-7: long ba'i tshogs rnams rab tu lam stor bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-8: 'jig rten rtag dang 'jig rten mi rtag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-9: rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kha cig mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-10: rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min zhes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-11: glang po'i dbang po khyim du btags ltar brlag //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-12: 'jig rten mtha' yod 'jig rten mtha' med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-13: mtha' yang yod la mtha' med kha cig mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-14: mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min ces te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-15: dper na bya ni gzeb tu bcug pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-16: la la dag ni lus la bdag ces mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-17: la la dag ni lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-18: rtog pas yongs su dkris nas nyal bgyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-19: bya ni bya rgyar chud nas thogs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-20: la la dag ni dbang phyug sprul zhes mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-21: la la rgyu med byung zhes 'dogs par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-22: lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis kun nas dkris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:285b-23: mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ltar rgyal bas gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-0: ji ltar gzeb tu bcug pa'i bya rmongs @286a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-1: pa; ;pu ga bu gar thar du re ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-2: mi mkhas lta ba'i rnam pas 'das par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-3: thar pa mi thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-4: tshangs dang skye rgu bdag dang skem byed dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-5: gzhon dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang rnam thos bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-6: phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-7: rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung ba bzhin; ;dbul po bu lon chags pa bu lon pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-8: bzung na gnyen sbron gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-9: lha ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i byis pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-10: dbang phyug las ni bde ba tshol bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-11: rkun po'i tshogs rnams btson rar stsal ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-12: 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal brgya myong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-13: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-14: phyag gi mthong na sor mo lnga dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-15: de la mi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-16: 'gro ba mkhyen pa 'gro ba spyod mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-17: blo mchog tshe rabs 'gro ba bkrol ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-18: dper na rgyal pos btson rnams bkye ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-19: 'jig rten sman slad bskal pa bsam yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-20: dka' ba mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-21: lta ba'i rnam par sems can 'khyams mkhyen nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-22: de dag bcings las khyod kyis grol bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286a-23: bde gshegs mi yi sengge rkang gnyis gtso //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-0: chos tshogs gang la @286b mnga' dbang khyod mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-1: lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar rmongs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-2: bde gshegs khyod ni de 'drar bdag cag 'tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-3: stobs rnams gang gis rgyal ba stobs brnyes shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-4: mi 'jigs gang gis bsngo ba'i dgra bsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-5: 'khor gyi nang du sengge'i sgra sgrog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-6: blo mchog de ni bdag cag thob par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-7: gang gis rgyal ba 'jig rten gsum bskyod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-8: gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-9: bdag gis mi mchog sems can lung ston pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-10: de ring yud kyis bdag cag de thob shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-11: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-13: 'jig rten phan bzhed 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-14: mu stegs tshogs 'di shin tu 'phags gyur tam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-15: mi mchog rang byung ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-16: 'dzum rgyu de ni khyod kyis bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-17: bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-19: zla ba nya la 'gro ba blta ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-20: blta zhing mchis na rgyal ba 'dzum rgyu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-21: su zhig rgyal la mchod pa dam pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:286b-22: gang gis de ring yab ni mnyes par bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-0: @287a *// rgyal ba'i yon tan de ring gang gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-1: mkhas pa myur du legs par bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-2: mu stegs can rnams lung bstan de thos na; ;'jig rten thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-3: 'di ltar 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas btul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-4: des na 'gro ba kun gyi rnam 'bren lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-5: rgyal bas the tshom legs par bsal du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-6: som nyi 'tshal ba'i som nyi dgum du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-7: des na 'khor rnams 'di yid rangs shing gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-8: sangs rgyas khyod kyi dgongs la dad par mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-10: rta thul khyod kyis dus 'di shes gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-11: rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la dris pa legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-12: 'dren pa rang byung nyid la de dris pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-13: 'jig rten phan pa'i tshig kyang brjod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-14: 'dzum pa 'di ni ji ltar ngas mdzad pa; ;'dzum rgyu ngas de khyod la bstan par bya'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-15: yang dag ji bzhin nga yi bstan pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-16: dga' ba'i yid du byos te deng nyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-17: mu stegs tshogs 'di rab tu dul 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-18: lta ba'i rnam spangs lta ba bzang por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-19: lta ba'i rnam par 'jig rten 'khyams mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287a-20: snying rje can gyur byang chub rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-0: lta ba'i rnam pa @287b dag ni rab spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-1: lta ba drang po rnyog med rtogs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-2: nga yis lung bstan thogs med thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-3: de dag kun gyis thams cad mkhyen sems bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-4: sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la dad bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-5: thugs rje ldan pa rkang gnyis dam pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-6: rgyal ba bye ba nyi shur tshang ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-7: bla med byang chub tshol zhing bsnyen bkur byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-8: rgyal ba rnams la sbyin pa mi nyung phul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-9: khrims dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-10: shes rab brtson 'grus stobs kyang 'bar bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-11: thugs rje ldan rnams drung du bzod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-12: byang chub dam pa btsal nas yun ring du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-13: pha rol phyin pa drug la blo yang zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-14: rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la zhu ba zhus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-15: sangs rgyas brgya bgrangs dag la yid dga' byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-16: de dag sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang gis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-17: lta ba'i rnam pa stug la gnas gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-18: de dag bde gshegs rang byung mthong gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-19: chags pa med pas lta ba'i rnam pa spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-20: ston pa'i dgongs pa yang dag rnam par rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-21: ston pa'i dgongs pa rnams la dad pa gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-22: ma 'ongs dus na byang chub tshol byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-23: rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-24: ma 'ongs bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:287b-25: rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom pa mtshan mthun pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-0: grags pa chen por phyogs su rnam @288a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-3: de dag sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-4: de dag bkod pa sna tshogs mtshungs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-5: sangs rgyas zhing der sdig pa'i blo can med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-6: blo gros dag par mthun pa sha stag gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-7: de ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-8: mi khom bsal te dus de'i tha ma la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-9: rgyal ba de dag sku tshe'i stobs ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-10: lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu thub par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-11: mi de dag gis byang chub 'di thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-12: de tshe mi mnyes par ni byed mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-13: chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi mtshan thos na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-14: bud med rnams kyang skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-15: de ltar nga rgyal bcom pa drang srong che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-16: ston pas mu stegs lung bstan bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-17: de thos gyur nas lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-18: yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-19: mu stegs can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-21: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dang bcas pas lha ma yin rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288a-22: nam mkha' lding rnams nas kun tu rgyu rnams kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa thos nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-0: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba thams cad @288b tshim par byas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-2: snyam nas de yang bu la chags pas kun tu dkris par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sems thugs su chud nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-5: khyod la tshangs par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-14: yongs su byang ba'i chos 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-15: khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-002:288b-16: de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do //
